apps.title: Loop Messenger
apps.description:
Embrace the Future of Group Messaging with Loop Messenger – Where conversations are organized, secure, and spam-free. Tailored for those who value a clutter-free messaging environment, Loop Messenger is emerging as the superior alternative to WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord and Slack.

KEY FEATURES
- Streamlined Group Messaging: Say goodbye to chaotic chat streams. Loop ensures your important discussions stay focused and on track.
- Direct Messaging: Never miss vital messages. Loop's innovative system allows for direct, private conversations in group settings.
- Customizable Chat Experience: Personalize with over 1,500 emojis and multiple themes. Make your chat environment truly yours.
- Broad Appeal: Ideal for gaming groups, businesses, schools, church groups, and more. Loop is versatile and adaptable.
- Uncompromising Security: Industry-leading encryption (TLS 1.2 and AES256) and SOC2 Type II Compliant for peace of mind.
- Easy to Use: Enjoy an intuitive interface with powerful controls. Manage topics, notifications, and more with ease.
- Robust Group Controls: Efficiently manage your group chats with advanced options like message deletion, editing, and copying.

Why Choose Loop? Loop Messenger is more than an app – it's a movement towards better, more efficient communication. Our commitment to privacy, coupled with a user-friendly design, makes Loop the premier choice for anyone seeking an elevated messaging experience.

Download Loop Messenger today for free – no hidden charges, no in-app purchases. Join the mission and experience the best in group messaging.

apps.title: Berkanan Messenger Lite
apps.description:
Berkanan Lite is a free and open-source Bluetooth-powered group messaging app for iOS, watchOS, tvOS, and macOS.

Broadcast messages anonymously to the crowd around you using Bluetooth. The message range is about 70 meters, but they can reach further because they are retransmitted by receiving apps. *

We believe this service is essential, especially in emergencies. It's enabled by apps joining forces using Berkanan SDK: https://github.com/zssz/BerkananSDK.

* Berkanan Lite for watchOS does not require an iOS companion. Unlike the iOS app, the watchOS and tvOS apps can send and receive messages only while running in the foreground.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Apply fixes from Berkanan SDK 2.2.8

Love using the app? Invite your friends! Rate us!

apps.title: Reminderbase: Scheduled Text
apps.description:
Reminderbase transforms how you communicate – from planning trips to automating appointment reminders, reducing no-shows, and growing your audience with hassle-free opt-ins. Our app ensures you never miss a beat in keeping your customers, colleagues, family, and friends top of mind. Trusted by over 16,000 users worldwide, turn every notification into a moment of connection. Remember everything better with Reminderbase!


We help you remember the important stuff, so you don’t have to. 


**Schedule text and email reminders.**
Schedule automated email and text messages from your personal or custom phone number on a one-off or recurring basis, with links and multimedia. Personalize your messages and save time with templates, all while ensuring your messages are delivered reliably. 

**Grow your audience with contact lists and sign-up links.**
Import contacts from your phone book and create contact lists for seamless bulk messaging. Generate subscribe links and share them anywhere, for your favorite people to join. 

**Remember more with calendar integration.*
Sync your Apple calendar with Reminderbase for automated reminders to yourself for personal or work-related appointments such as meetings, doctor appointments, deadlines, birthdays, and crucial tasks.

**Stay connected and boost your impact with audience trends.**
Monitor the growth trends and patterns of your contact list through our weekly updates. Gain valuable insights into your audience's engagement and identify peak sending times for creating well-timed interactions.

**Engage your audience with two-way conversations.**
Enhance engagement with two-way messaging and provide instant support through Conversations, fostering stronger relationships and ensuring a seamless support experience with an upgraded plan. 

**Important Note on Messaging Limits and Usage:**

- International text messages sent outside the U.S. are subject to higher costs. Depending on the country's cost, they will reduce your SMS/MMS limit by more than 1.

- With our upgraded plan, you can now enjoy the flexibility to send text messages using your custom number and choose one of our available local U.S. phone numbers.

Thank you for your understanding and happy remembering with Reminderbase!

Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase. Terms of Service URL: https://www.reminderbase.com/terms-of-service

apps.title: SchoolMessenger
apps.description:
The new SchoolMessenger app gives busy parents, students, and staff a powerful way to stay engaged with their school or district, and connect to each other.
App Features:
- Easy-to-read inbox that captures all SchoolMessenger notifications, and now two-way teacher-parent-student messages (if enabled by school or district)
- Scrollable notification view to review all phone, email, and text content in a single place
- Detailed preference control allows adjusting notification settings
- Push notifications are available for alerts when school or district sends a message
Requirements:
- For notifications, school or district has SchoolMessenger notification service subscription with SchoolMessenger app enabled
- For notifications, valid email address on file with your school or district
- WiFi or data plan for internet access
- iOS 14+
Note: 
SchoolMessenger app is not for sending broadcast messages. If you are a SchoolMessenger Communicate notification customer looking to send broadcast messages, please download the SchoolMessenger Admin sender app.

raw_data.description:
The new SchoolMessenger app gives busy parents, students, and staff a powerful way to stay engaged with their school or district, and connect to each other.
App Features:
- Easy-to-read inbox that captures all SchoolMessenger notifications, and now two-way teacher-parent-student messages (if enabled by school or district)
- Scrollable notification view to review all phone, email, and text content in a single place
- Detailed preference control allows adjusting notification settings
- Push notifications are available for alerts when school or district sends a message
Requirements:
- For notifications, school or district has SchoolMessenger notification service subscription with SchoolMessenger app enabled
- For notifications, valid email address on file with your school or district
- WiFi or data plan for internet access
- iOS 14+
Note: 
SchoolMessenger app is not for sending broadcast messages. If you are a SchoolMessenger Communicate notification customer looking to send broadcast messages, please download the SchoolMessenger Admin sender app.

apps.title: Connected2.me - Chat & Meet
apps.description:
Let people chat with you anonymously! 
Discover Shuffle list to meet new people or
Share your profile link to connect with your friends!

Millions of people are here, waiting you for anonymous chat!

Start enjoying free chat;
•	Use the Shuffle feature to see who's online and available for chat
•	Share your story or let's discover new stories!
•	Set up your profile then get a special link
•	Share it on social media to invite people
•	Let them connect with you freely!

MESSAGING FAST & FREE FOR EVERYONE

A brand new social network experience! Start chatting with people you already know, as well as people you want to meet. Just relax, you are anonymous! 

Share secrets, confessions or gossip!
Confess your feelings, thoughts, emotions and secrets freely. 
Your confessions will remain anonymous.
A perfect way to meet new people without giving away your identity!

Celebrities, social media phenomena are found on Connected2.me, so you can chat with them too! Ask questions or share your secrets.

WHAT’S MORE?

Choose a “Shuffle Promote” option to boost your profile on shuffle to get more messages or Upgrade to “Connected2.me Plus” for outstanding plus features —including extra shuffle promotions and a plus badge for your profile!

Download the C2 app today and join the world's newest social media network that's transforming the way people meet and interact online!

----------------------------------

If you choose to purchase Connected2.me Plus, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. If you don’t choose to purchase Connected2.me Plus, you can simply continue using C2 for free.

By using Connected2.me, you agree with our Terms and Privacy Policy: https://connected2.me/en/terms

apps.title: Paltalk: Chat, Meet New People
apps.description:
Paltalk provides free group video chat to connect you to pals, peers, and potential friends around the world. Join one of our thousands of chat rooms to text, voice, and video chat live about music, politics, sports, and more — whatever your interests, there’s a world of friends ready to talk. 

Cam up for karaoke or meet people internationally from the comfort of your computer or mobile device. Want a private conversation? Message or call your pals directly with our one-to-one messaging capabilities.
 
With more than 20 years experience in social technology, Paltalk is ready to help you meet and connect. Download the free app and explore today.
 
Features:
-FREE: text, voice, and video chat are free with download; upgrade to view more cams and join more rooms simultaneously. Plus, no extra fees for international messaging or calling.

-EXCLUSIVE VIRTUAL STORE: send and receive virtual stickers and gifts exclusive to the Paltalk ecosystem, with special appearances from pop culture characters and brands you love; try sending gifts as an icebreaker with a hello message for a new friend. Each gift sent or received earns points toward special status as a Paltalk Crown member.

-DYNAMIC AND ADAPTABLE: works on desktop, laptop, and mobile devices using 3G, 4G, LTE, or WiFi as available. Paltalk will even run in the background of your device if you want to listen to your favorite room or talk to a friend while you read emails. Never miss a great moment (or international call) again.

-PUBLIC OR PRIVATE: for the social butterfly looking to meet people or talk to a group, join one of our thousands of live rooms and hop on cam; if you want something more private, try text messaging or video or voice calling your pals in a one-to-one conversation. Talking is easy— talking how you like is Paltalk’s specialty.

-INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITY, LOCAL FLAVOR: whether you’re looking to learn a new language, rock out to your favorite song, or examine the social issues in your city elections, Paltalk has a room for you. Can’t find a specific topic? Create a group and host your own room.

-UNLIMITED VIDEO: view an unlimited number of high-quality live cams in groups and rooms that interest you. Camera shy? Socialize via voice and text chat to meet new friends who are live.

If you like our apps, please take a moment to rate us in the App Store. For bug reports or complaints, email ptmobile@paltalk.com. We read and reply to every message.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:
We’ve been busy behind the scenes making improvements to keep your experience smooth and enjoyable:

- Bug fixes and performance enhancements

apps.title: Plus: Dual Messenger for iPad
apps.description:
Plus: Dual Messenger is the #1 Easiest way to use a second Messenger on your phone or iPad synchronously!

Do you need additional Messenger? Plus: Dual Messenger for WA is the solution. Just scan the QR code on your phone or iPad and start using your second WhatsApp. Manage your chats easily and separate your business life from your private life.

Plus: Dual Messenger for WA is an UNOFFICIAL tool for WhatsApp and Telegram Messenger. Plus: Dual Messenger for WA is developed by an independent developer. We are NOT affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with WhatsApp LLC, or any of its subsidiaries or its affiliates. Usage in this app falls within the guidelines of "fair use".

Key Features:

    Dual Messenger: Use the dual chat feature and enjoy about second WhatsApp and Telegram Messenger!
    Second Phone Number: Use a second phone number to chat.
    Manage Your Chats: Separate your business chats and private chats easily.

About Subscriptions and Terms of Use:

    For Unlimited Features of Plus: Dual Messenger, some Premium subscriptions are needed.
    Payment will be made from your iTunes account after you confirm the purchase.
    Subscriptions will auto-renew at the end of each term if it is not canceled 24 hours before the end of the purchasing term.
    The user can manage subscriptions. Auto-renew can be turned off from iTunes account settings.
    You can cancel your subscriptions by entering: http://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039
    Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/dualmessengerweb/privacypolicy
    Terms of Use: https://sites.google.com/view/dualmessengerweb/termsofuse

apps.title: Easy Message - Group Mass Text
apps.description:
Easy Message LITE - Mass text And Bulk Group Messaging! 

Mass Email, SMS and Social Media in just one app, with just one message!

------------------------- KEY FEATURES ----------------------------------
- Powerful marketing tool for business or personal usage
- One text message for all recipient types. Write just once!
- Supports multiple messaging services (Email, Social media, SMS/MMS/iMessage)
(Note that the text services are configured on your phone Settings > Messages)
- Bulk texting to groups or individuals
- Custom templates. Create and reuse messages!
- Advanced settings for contacts and groups management!
- Support for multiple image attachments!
- Use multiple messaging services at once!
- Includes birthday reminders!
- Messages scheduler for later delivery! (via notifications)
- Reach multiple recipient types (with different contact info on the address book) at once:
You can write just 1 message and send it to a group or individuals, even if some are email contacts, other phone numbers, both, etc, depending on the app settings. 
Just select "Use both services" on the app settings and the app will know how to reach them all.

- Import of iCloud groups
- Dark mode support
- Unlimited messages *
- Quick recipients selection mode and group management 
- Easily create/update/delete contacts, groups and template messages
- Useful help tooltips
- Available FAQ & Video Tutorial (English only)

----------------------------- HOW IT WORKS----------------------------------
Send messages to groups or everyone you know, typing the message just once.
Reach all your contacts by Email, SMS/MMS/iMessage, and/or post to social networks (Twitter, Facebook & LinkedIn) at the same time, at once. No need to write separate messages or use different software/media.  Just confirm and send!
Use built-in common messages or create custom ones. Archive them for future usage if you're lazy. 
Manage your contacts and create custom groups to speedup messaging.  
Easy Message is even clever enough to know how each contact should be reached
Add recipients to you message just by selecting them
Create new groups or update existing ones, just by selecting multiple contacts

----------------------- REQUIREMENTS ----------------------

This app requires IOS 9 or later.

------------------------- NOTES -------------------------------

Note: On iPad you can only send messages via Email or iMessage (since SMS/MMS is not available on iPad devices due to the lack of a SIM card)

* On phones, if you want undisclosed recipients and not a group text you must use plain SMS (these services must be configured on your phone Settings -> Messages). When doing this, remember that some mobile operators might limit the number of your recipients, and having too many recipients may cause failure in your recipients receiving your messages. In addition, always make sure your selected recipients have valid phone numbers. 
-------------------------------------------------------------

FAQ (English only) available here: https://pcdreamsapps.wixsite.com/easymessage/faq

Good looking icons by:
Glyphish,  glyphish.com
CrazEriC, http://crazeric.deviantart.com/
Lenka Meleakova, http://www.profimagazin.cz
Visual Pharm, http://www.visualpharm.com
Zen Nikki - http://zen-nikki.deviantart.com/

apps.title: Speak N Send - Audio messaging
apps.description:
Tap, Speak, and Send via SMS or Email

Most apps make things complicated. With Speak N Send, it couldn't be easier. Tap, start speaking, then send.

Send a voice memo to anyone, even if they don't have the Speak N Send app. No signup needed. Send to any smartphone, computer or tablet.

No need to create an account, buy credits, or sign up for another service. Simply download the Speak N Send app and you're ready to send voice messages to one or several recipients, by sms or email.

- Your real voice
Send your actual voice recording so there is no chance for voice-to-text problems, auto-correct errors and miscommunication.

- Group Send
Send your voice message to one or many recipients, just like any other sms or email message.

- Latest iOS Features
Makes use of the latest iOS features, including MMS and iMessage. Send Voice SMS to friends on older and latest iOS versions.

- New Pre-fill feature
Lets you specify a favorite email address to send to with one click

Have suggestions or comments? Reach out to us on Twitter @speakNsend

Note: when sending sms/mms, standard carrier fees apply.

** Please note: If you are having difficulty with recordings cutting off early, while you are still speaking, the following settings may help. Press the 'Gear Icon' on the home screen to go into settings, and note the 'Sensitivity' slider. Try lowering the sensitivity by moving the slider to the left.

apps.title: Bottled · Message in a Bottle
apps.description:
Release what’s on your mind


* Write your message, place it in a bottle and launch it into the sunset 
* Meeting new friends and finding support has never been so simple
* Hop aboard our growing community of over 4M users

Try the modern version of sending a message in a Bottle - a new way to meet people all over the world!

Bottled allows you to send a message to anyone, anywhere in the world.

However, your messages will be received by one unique individual!

Depending on the content of your Bottled message, the recipients can decide whether or not to keep it.

If your Bottled message is kept, you will be able to chat with each other.

If your Bottled message gets released, your bottle will float back into the sea to be received by another stranger!


Whether you are looking for a friend, a pen pal, support or simply an intellectual connection, let serendipity decide your chance encounters with Bottled!

Chatting without pressure: improve your wellbeing and confidence through a supportive community.

*** If you need assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us at contact@bottledapp.com ***

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Travel re-opening: unlock global encounters with just a single tap!
- A golden fish has washed up on your shore: get a bottle delivered instantly if you can’t wait!
- bug fixes & performance improvement

Generate smarter messages with AI and boost every conversation.
AI and chat in one iPhone and iPad app.

• AI tools to speed up and elevate your communication
• Simple organization to handle personal, work, and study conversations

### POWERFUL AI FEATURES

• AI Smart Text Generator — craft original, engaging messages for any purpose
• AI Message Enhancer — rephrase, expand, or summarize chat texts to match your tone
• AI Conversation Summaries — condense long threads into quick highlights
• AI Quote Generator — pick a theme and get a share‑ready image with an inspiring quote
• AI Quick Reply Suggestions — context‑aware replies that accelerate conversations
• Easy Device Linking — create QR codes in‑app to pair new chat devices fast
• GIF Library (powered by GIPHY) — drop the perfect animated GIF into any exchange

Some features require a purchase or subscription.

### WHY CHOOSE MESSENGER MULTI?

• Intuitive and fast UI — familiar layout for iPhone and iPad
• On‑device privacy — your data stays secure and local
• Built for everyone — students, freelancers, entrepreneurs, and support teams
• Productivity‑first — automate replies, polish outreach, and save time with AI

### PRO — UNLOCK FULL AI POWER

• 100% ad‑free experience
• Unlimited access to every AI tool
• Frequent updates with the newest improvements

Pro requires a purchase or subscription.

• Internet connection for AI services
• The latest version of your messaging app installed

Transform the way you chat. Download Messenger Multi for AI now and put true AI power into every conversation!

Your team can access the services from their desktop computer or on-the-go with this app.  

This is a companion app for Beetexting users to access their services on-the-go.Here are some of Beetexting's features you can take for a test drive as part of our 14-day free trial:

SMS Marketing

Mass text or Broadcast Messages

Tag Customers to Make Targeted Lists

Text Customers One-on-one / Conversational Texting

apps.title: Kyew - Schedule Text Messages
apps.description:
Kyew lets you write & schedule text messages to send later.

HOW IT WORKS

1. Install this app
2. Compose a new message
3. Attach relevant photos, videos, or files
4. Set the due date
5. You'll get notified, press send, done.

Kyew (pronounced "Q" as in cue) will save your message, including any attachments, and send you a notification at the scheduled time. Upon opening the notification, your pre-composed message will be ready to send in one tap. 

You can set up a recurring schedule to send text messages daily,  weekly, monthly, or yearly. This is ideal for both personal and business use.


GROUP TEXT & MASS MESSAGES

Send individual text messages to multiple people. You can create and manage groups within the app, or import from your contacts. This is a terrific function that allows you to write a message once and dispatch it to an entire group individually without creating a group chat. It's similar to BCC'ing a group of contacts in an email.


FOR PERSONAL USE

* Birthdays & anniversaries
* Remember important days
* Stay in touch with old friends
* Invitations
* Count-down reminders (e.g. "10 days until Hawaii")
* Etc.


FOR BUSINESS USE

Did you know that 98% of texts are opened, and most of them are read within 5 minutes? Texting is indispensable for your business, and Kyew is your trusted texting tool.

* Appointment reminders
* Renewal/Expiration notices
* Follow-ups
* Content-promotion
* Customer-relationship management
* Etc.


KYEW PLUS

The app is free to use, but some functionality requires a subscription. See in-app for details.

Privacy Policy: https://www.saturdaytechnologies.com/privacy

Terms of Use: https://www.saturdaytechnologies.com/terms

apps.title: Yubo: Chat Meet & Make Friends
apps.description:
Welcome to Yubo – the ultimate social platform for making new friends all over the world! With millions of users worldwide, we’re all about connecting you with like-minded people in a fun and safe place! 

FEW THINGS YOU NEED TO KNOW ABOUT YUBO

1) SWIPE TO MAKE NEW FRIENDS: Use our swipe feature to find new friends who are online and share the same interests! With just a swipe, you could meet your new bestie!

2) CHAT WITH FRIENDS WORLDWIDE: One of the coolest things about Yubo is that you can chat with people from all over the world! Whether you're feeling silly, want to sing, dance, or chat about your day, Yubo has got you covered!

3) FIND YOUR TRIBE: At Yubo, finding your tribe is key to making lasting connections! Thanks to the Tags, you can find other people into gaming, beauty, sports, music, dance, and so much more! So, whether you’re a gamer, a makeup artist, or just looking for like-minded friends, Yubo has got you covered!

4) IT’S FREE: Yubo is totally free to use! 

5) IT’S SAFE: We take your safety seriously. That's why we've designed many features and tools to ensure you can use Yubo safely. 

So, what are you waiting for? 

And, as always, feel free to contact us on Instagram (@yubo_app) or Twitter (@yubo_app) with any questions or feedback!

Yubo is free to download and use, which will never change for our main features. However, if you want to get the most from Yubo, you can subscribe to one of our optional products, the Yubo Power Pack or Yubo Elite Pack.
We offer weekly, monthly, and 3-month subscriptions, giving discounts on the weekly price. The prices may vary per country and are subject to change without notice. Prices are clearly displayed in the app.

* Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
* Your subscription will automatically renew itself unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
* Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period.
* You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings in the iTunes Store.
* If offered, if you choose to use our free trial, any unused portion of the free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription to that publication, where applicable
* If you don’t choose to purchase Yubo Power Pack or Yubo Elite Pack, you can continue using and enjoying Yubo for free.


Your personal data is securely stored on Yubo - be sure to read our privacy policy and terms and conditions:
https://yubo.live/legal/privacy 
https://yubo.live/legal/terms

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Stars Messenger Kids Safe Chat
apps.description:
Welcome to Stars Messenger Kids - private, safe, and free messaging/video chat for kids and all ages. Stars Messenger Kids lets you safely message, call, and group video chat with your family and friends without any phone number, strangers, or ads.

On most messaging platforms, once your phone number or username is publicly discovered, you are no longer in control of who can contact you. Stars is safe by design - instead of searching for people to add, users need their friend’s username as well as their unique private Friend Code. With the ability to reset your Friend Code, you are always in control of who can connect with you. All group chats are also protected with a unique group code. 

Parents can also optionally enable Parent View for their child. Parent View allows you the ability to see who your child is friends with, the groups they're in, their time spent on Stars, and more. You'll receive notifications in real time upon your child's activity. 


Stars Messenger Kids isn’t just safe, it’s super fun too: 

Customizable message styles with a range of fonts, colors, and sizes
Cool emojis!
Group video call
Send custom quick messages with just 1 tap - “On my way!”, “What’s for dinner?”
Share Photos, Videos, and Audio messages with friends and family
Create private group chats with family and friends
Supports all devices


We guarantee:

Stars Messenger Kids App is free to use
Works on smartphones and tablets
A 100% safe, private, phishing and spam-free environment
No ads.
A friend code that you can reset at anytime
No phone number is required to use Stars Messenger Kids
Lots of fun and memories!


DOWNLOAD STARS MESSENGER KIDS TODAY!

What are you waiting for? Download Stars Messenger Kids App for FREE and enjoy 100% safe chatting, video calling, and group video chats with your family and friends using our kids messenger app. Have fun!


Try it, you will love it :) Thanks!


GIVE US FEEDBACK:
If you like the Stars Messenger Kids app, please give us feedback. We always appreciate your suggestions, improvement ideas, and recommendations. Send us your feedback at help@GetStarsApp.com or you can visit our site at www.GetStarsApp.com so that we can improve our kids messenger app and give you more and better features in the future.


FAQ:

Q: What is a Friend Code?

A: On Stars, your Friend Code is your unique randomly generated code that you should only give out to the people that you want to be added by on Stars. You can reset this for a new randomly generated code at any time. To add a friend on Stars, you will need to ask them for their username and friend code, and to be added on Stars, they will need your username and friend code.


Q: I don’t want to talk to someone anymore on Stars. What should I do?

A: Step one is to delete the person you no longer want to talk to. After you delete the person from your contacts, you will be prompted to reset your Friend Code - this way, the person you have blocked will have no way to add you again. All done! This is unlike a phone number, email, or public username, which you cannot just easily change to avoid someone. 


Q: Can I decline add requests?

A: Yes! On Stars, you must first accept add requests first for that person to be able to message you. If you don’t know the person, or don’t want to talk to them, you can decline the request.


Terms of Use:

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.title: SoftTalk Messenger
apps.description:
SoftTalk Messenger is Nigeria's Messaging App which allows users to Chat, make FREE audio and video calls and shop genuine products and services!

Connect with friends and family using Soft Talk instant messaging, voice calls, or video chats.
Choose a contact from your phone book or simply enter a phone number to add a new contact on Soft Talk messenger. Send a voice note, or take advantage of the other amazing features that Soft Talk offers beyond just free messages! Share photos and videos, enjoy emoji icons, record audio messages, and even send files.

Call Packages!
Free Calls to the US/Canada/UK, Japan, India, Singapore etc
With SoftTalk messenger, You can subscribe to available packages to call mobile and landline for free monthly. Simply select your choice of destinations and start calling mobile direct.. That's it! When you exceed your free monthly subscription, you may purchase credit to call the world.

Premium Calls!
While SoftTalk to SoftTalk Calls are always free, you can call the world with our super low rate tarif to Pakistan, Nigeria, Ghana, India, Nepal, Japan, US/Canada etc, using our Premium route that delivers your exact caller ID to your receiver. Add credit to your wallet to start calling the world right now.

Group chat!
With SoftTalk messenger, it’s easy to create and join group chats - Chat in a group with your favorite people, classmates, family and friends.

Whether you’re looking for a quality brand new or used phone, the longest battery life or accessories, there’s always something for you on SoftTalk Messenger, the first Nigeria’s Messaging app which enables users to not just chat but shop for quality controlled products and services.

Keep Soft Talking, Soft chatting and Soft shopping

apps.title: Line2 - Second Phone Number
apps.description:
Line2 is the most affordable, reliable & simple way to set up a second phone number and connect anywhere! Get a second line & access unlimited calls, text & voicemail features. It’s time for a better way to communicate - Line2 is your call and text app solution.

Your personal phone number should stay personal. Line2 makes it simple to screen and block calls to maintain your privacy with robust features that help you say goodbye to annoying spam calls. Keep your second phone number safe with Line2’s premier communications system that allows you to receive and make calls worry-free.

Line2 is more than just a calling app. Line2 provides unlimited text and group messaging, making it the robust calling and texting app you need. Set up a second phone number and message friends and loved ones wherever you are. Line2 offers WiFi texting, so you can receive messages without eating up your mobile data. Line2 is the easiest way to set up local or vanity numbers to stay connected anytime, anywhere with a new number.

Line2 is your calling and texting app for private and convenient phone calls and texts from anywhere. Download the simplest texting and calling app today and start connecting.

LINE2 FEATURES

Privacy First
- Call screening to detect if a phone call is spam or not
- Call blocking means not worrying about unwanted numbers reaching your phone
- With caller ID you can safely know who is calling you

Set Up a Second Phone Number
- Manage a second phone number with Line2’s features that make creating one (or many!) easy
- Create a vanity number, texting number, or second line with Line2
- Add multiple phone numbers to your device and receive or make phone calls from anywhere

Local and Vanity Phone Numbers
- Our calling and texting app lets you create localized and vanity phone numbers- Export your existing phone number to Line2 to keep all of your communication in one place
- Set up a new number to connect wherever you are heading next

Unlimited Text and Call App
-Enjoy unlimited texting and calling on Line2
- Unlimited VoIP calls and text across the United States and Canada

No Cellular Data Needed
- VoIP technology lets you make and receive calls and texts from anywhere, at any time
- Say goodbye to cellular data expenses with Line2’s WiFi calls
- Enjoy WiFi texting and never worry about extra SMS and MMS costs again

Calling App That Does More
- Access your new number’s voicemail and contacts from your smartphone, tablet or computer
- Call recording lets you record calls automatically to help keep track of important conversations
- Use call forwarding so you never miss a call
- Group messaging and private texting are at your fingertips with Line2

All plans have a 30-day Money Back Guarantee if you are not satisfied with our services
Get unlimited texting and calling with Line2 when you sign up for one of our plans:

Personal
- Monthly: $9.99
- Yearly: $95.90

Questions? We’re here to help at http://help.line2.com or tap Settings -> Help from within the app.

Note: Your cellular provider may prohibit or restrict VoIP (Voice over Internet Protocol) on their network. It’s your responsibility to check with your cellular provider about their VoIP functionality, and any additional charges it may incur. Line2 is not responsible for any additional cellular charges that may occur as a result of using the Line2 service.

Business/Work users who send SMS/MMS to U.S. numbers must complete a registration process after purchase, as required by U.S. mobile carriers. Business messages sent from unregistered numbers may be subject to non-delivery by mobile carriers. Line2 does not provide refunds or credits due to issues with messaging from unregistered numbers. Please visit https://try.line2.com/10dlc/mobile/faq/.

Privacy Policy: https://www.line2.com/privacy/
End User License Agreement: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

It’s your responsibility to check with your cellular provider about their VoIP functionality, and any additional charges it may incur. Line2 is not responsible for any additional cellular charges that may occur as a result of using the Line2 service.

Business/Work users who send SMS/MMS to U.S. numbers must complete a registration process after purchase, as required by U.S. mobile carriers. Business messages sent from unregistered numbers may be subject to non-delivery by mobile carriers. Line2 does not provide refunds or credits due to issues with messaging from unregistered numbers. Please visit https://try.line2.com/10dlc/mobile/faq/.

Privacy Policy: https://www.line2.com/privacy/
End User License Agreement: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.title: Carrier Messaging
apps.description:
Carrier is the best way to schedule messages.

**Note:** For your privacy, it is not possible to send messages on your behalf without you taking action. You have to push send when you get the notification. Don't forget!

## Why I created this
Asking Siri to remind you to send someone a message only helps if you can remember what you wanted to say. After forgetting one too many times to send an important message, I decided to make an app to help me out. Now I can write and schedule the message when I think of it and send it at just the right time.

## How it works
Just as when sending a regular text message, you select a person and write your message. Then you choose the date and time for the message to send. When the time comes, you will get a notification that will allow you to send the message. It integrates with the built-in Messages app, so it comes from you in your normal conversations.

## Contacts
If you choose to give Carrier access to your contacts, it is effortless to select a recipient for your message. Rest assured that your contacts are not harvested or shared with anyone—it just makes your life easier. If you do not give access, you can still select a recipient.

## Groups
When you choose multiple recipients for a message, you will be prompted to create a group to make it easier to message those people again. You can manage your groups in Settings at any time.

## Dark theme
A gorgeous dark theme makes writing and scheduling messages in low light easy on your eyes. And with automatic switching from light to dark themes, you can always have the best experience for the moment.

## Pro upgrade
Carrier is free to use for a limited number of messages each month. When you upgrade to Carrier Pro, you will unlock unlimited messages, the ability to use your voice to create and schedule messages, and help support continued development. Thanks!

## Family project
As I have worked on this app, my kids have contributed lots of ideas for features. My eleven-year-old daughter thought of many of the Easter eggs, and hopes you will enjoy finding them.

We hope this will be as much help for you as it has been for us!
-Ben

raw_data.releaseNotes:
This version adds the ability to send individual messages to recipients in a group. When editing the group, you can choose whether to send a group message or individual messages. Thanks Kelly M. for requesting this!

This also makes some other small fixes and improvements. Thanks for all your support, and let me know your thoughts on the update.

-Ben

apps.title: RingCentral
apps.description:
Run your entire business from your phone—AI included

Bring your calls, messages, meetings, and faxes together in one reliable app. Plus, our built-in AI Assistant is here to help. From taking notes during calls to catching typos in messages to transcribing video meetings—AI helps you get more done across all your conversations.

Why businesses love RingCentral:
-Reliable, secure calling with AI notes, so you’ll never miss any details
-Team chat with unlimited file-sharing and AI that polishes messages
-HD video meetings with AI transcriptions and whiteboarding
-Business SMS with instant translations
-Securing digital faxing right from your phone
-Work and personal modes featuring do-not-disturb and business hour settings

Everything to help your business grow:
-Enterprise-grade security, reliability, and compliance
-Built-in AI across calls, messages, and meetings
-Effortless team onboarding and management
-Integrations with 400+ pre-built apps like Microsoft Teams, Google, and Salesforce
-Experience enterprise-grade security, crystal-clear audio quality, and 99.999% uptime reliability to keep your business running smoothly. 

Join over 400,000 organizations worldwide who use RingCentral to run their business. Download RingCentral today and transform the way your teams connect, collaborate, and get work done.

Additional features available with Core, Advanced, or Ultra subscription.*

apps.title: Bloomz: For Teachers & Schools
apps.description:
One app for all your parent communication.

Bloomz is the FREE award-winning app that saves teachers lots of time in all parent communications, while creating a supportive classroom community. 

“Make your life easier by consolidating all of your communications and coordination with parents.” – WeAreTeachers

“If you’re looking for ways to build relationships with and between families, check out Bloomz!” – The Cornerstone for Teachers

“There’s one app that does it all, it’s called Bloomz.” – Vicki Davis (CoolCatTeacher)

Bloomz makes it easy for teachers to securely share photos, classroom updates and reach parents instantly through messaging, as well as to coordinate events (like PT Conferences) and sign up for volunteers.

Bloomz now supports Student Timelines, a simple & beautiful way to capture and share student-driven portfolios. Students can publish their work by quickly scanning a QR code and annotating their work. Teachers can approve and instantly share with parents on Student's Timelines.

With Bloomz teachers can:

- Post class updates and share pictures, and see who’s viewing them
- Manage events and calendar, with built-in reminders
- Schedule Parent-Teacher Conferences in seconds
- Sign up volunteers in a few easy steps
- Message one or more parents, without sharing their cell phone number
- Send alerts notifications for urgent matters, to both phone and email in one click.
- Invite parents via email or class code for privacy
- Capture & share student-driven portfolios with parents securely via Student Timelines
- Reinforce students’ positive behavior, sharing notes and awards with parents

With Bloomz parents can:

- Sign up FREE and be notified via SMS/TEXT messaging 
- Choose between push and email notifications, as well as their frequency
- Read posts in their preferred language with one-click translations (80 languages available)
- Communicate with other parents for play dates, carpooling and more

Awards:

- New Education Product of 2016 – EdTech Digest
- 2015 Awards of Excellence – Tech & Learning
- The National Parenting Center Seal of Approval
- Top 20 Most Promising K12 Technology – CIO Review
- People’s Choice Award – Stevie Awards
- Best of Show @ ISTE 2016 – Tech & Learning
- Best Website for Teaching and Learning 2016 – American Association of School Librarians (AASL)

Subscription:
Bloomz is always free for teachers, parents and schools. Bloomz may experiment with different premium experiences, while continue to offer both educators and parents a free platform to connect, coordinate and communicate. 

The Bloomz Convenience Pack is an easy and quick way to download and share media posted on Bloomz, in full resolution, and without restrictions.* For only $1.67 a month (billed annually at $19.99), parents get photo and video downloads at full resolution on both mobile and desktop, with multiple media selection (including full albums) and unlimited access, even after class is archived. Note: Teachers can always upload unlimited number of photos and/or videos to share with parents at no cost.

* Your subscription is effective for 1 calendar year starting with your purchase. Your iTunes account will be charged at confirmation of purchase and automatically renews at the then current price, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings, and you can cancel any time by emailing support@bloomz.com. You can ask for a refund within the first 15 days as long as no content has been downloaded after payment. Prices shown are in U.S. dollars. Other restrictions apply.

Privacy Policy: https://www.bloomz.net/privacypolicy
Terms: https://www.bloomz.net/terms

Follow us on:
Facebook.com/BloomzApp
Twitter.com/BloomzApp

GoChat Messenger is a free calling and messaging app that keeps you connected with high-quality voice and video calls, secure messaging, and seamless file sharing, all in one reliable and user-friendly platform. 


Why Choose GoChat?

Secure VoIP Calls: Enjoy encrypted voice and video calls on 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G, or Wi-Fi without a VPN. Experience fast, secure, and reliable communication anytime, anywhere.

Global Connectivity: Make secure calls across borders-locally or internationally. GoChat keeps your conversations private and safe.

Group Chats & Free Video Calls: Stay in touch with private group chats and HD video calls, no matter where your contacts are.

Go-VIP Subscription: Unlock an ad-free experience, exclusive stickers, VIP profile badge, and exclusive GoChat app icons with a monthly or yearly membership.


Exclusive GoChat Coins: Earn GoChat Coins by using the app and redeem them for free mobile data, Go-VIP Subscription, premium stickers, and more.

Interactive Social Features: Connect with friends through live voice chat rooms and interactive activities that make conversations more engaging.

More Features: 

• Invite friends and earn rewards 

• Quick contact sharing 


• High-quality file sharing


Download GoChat Messenger today and transform how you stay connected with friends, family, and colleagues worldwide!

apps.title: Pingtumi
apps.description:
Introducing Pingtumi "Ping-To-Me": Revolutionizing Group Communication with Privacy in Mind!

Engage seamlessly with large groups using Pingtumi, the ultimate mobile broadcast and group messaging app. With a suite of powerful features and a commitment to privacy, Pingtumi empowers you to connect effortlessly with friends, colleagues, and communities. Here's why Pingtumi is the communication app you've been waiting for:

Privacy Matters:
At Pingtumi, we prioritize your privacy. Unlike other apps, we don't require your mobile number to subscribe, we don't request access to your contacts, and we never sell your data. Enjoy peace of mind while connecting with others.

Effortless Group Communication:

Create Channels: Public or private, build channels around any topic and invite others to join.

Message Management: Craft, save, send, or schedule messages within channels effortlessly.

QR Code and URL: Each channel comes with a unique QR code and URL for easy sharing and joining.

Seamless Integration with iMessage:
Take your conversations to the next level with Pingtumi for iMessage. Explore exciting features designed to enhance your messaging experience:

Cards:
Create and send personalized e-cards complete with special effects as an iMessage or App Clip. 

Sticky Note:
Stand out in your iMessage group with eye-catching personal or AI-generated sticky notes that bring a smile to everyone's face.

Location Sharing:
Send your location or any spot directly to your chat group, making planning and coordination a breeze.

Video Messages:
Send quick video messages with minimal taps, adding a personal touch to your conversations.

Availability & Calendar Events:
Effortlessly share your availability and create calendar events directly from iMessage, eliminating the need to switch to email.

Reminders & Shared Lists:
Create, share, and manage reminders with a single tap. Shared Lists allow collaborative list creation and easy updates within your iMessage group.

Polls
Engage your group with simple yet fun polls.

Pingtumi is not just an app; it's a revolution in broadcast communication. Download now and experience the future of connected conversations!

Happy Pinging!

apps.title: LiteWire Messaging
apps.description:
Just another messaging app to clutter your app drawer, right? That's exactly what LiteWire is, and we don't even have degrees from MIT or Harvard like everyone else. But, we are the only messaging app that is as fun as we are safe. With just one gesture, you can delete any regretful text, or send a distress beacon that alerts your close contacts of your location and mic recordings of your surroundings. LiteWire will protect you from embarrassing decisions just as much as it will protect you from danger. Here’s a shortlist of our features:

- Complete anonymity for sign up: no phone number, contacts, email address, last four of your social and credit card CVC code, blood type, etc. Just agree on a channel name or find each other by username.
- Deleting messages deletes for all parties. This includes images and videos you send.
- Custom watermarks protect your private content on your buddies’ devices, along with screenshot notifications
- Distress beacon tells your close buddies your exact GPS coordinates and continual audio recordings of your surroundings.
- End to end encryption, obviously. We can't read anything you send and don't want to. It's probably boring.
- We are free! Other chat apps that offer similar features want your money. Gross.

We made this app so you are in complete control of your communications and feel safe, both in the cyber world and the real world. Protect your communications from ex’s, Apples, Googles, and governments with LiteWire, the ultimate app for sexting (safe texting).

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Fixed profile pictures not updating to buddies
- Fixed crash on app-open related to app trying to connect to old, discontinued custom TCP server

apps.title: Whiteboard - Widget Messaging
apps.description:
Send doodles, drawings, messages, and more directly to your friends’ widgets!

Whiteboard makes staying connected fun and creative. Share quick sketches, notes, photos, and even group messages that appear right on your friends’ home screens.

-------

Drawing

Choose from different pen styles, thicknesses, and colors—or create your own custom colors and save them as presets. Add backgrounds, photos from your library or camera, text, and more. Save drafts to finish your creations later.

-------

Friends

Your account starts as private so only friends can send you messages. Switch to public if you’d like anyone in the app to connect with you. Finding friends is simple—search nearby, sync your contacts, or share your invite code.

-------

Groups

Create groups to share doodles and messages between multiple friends all in one widget. Think of it as group chat, but more fun and visual.

-------

Widgets

Add multiple widgets to keep up with all your messages. Choose from:
- Recent Messages: See the latest updates from friends and groups.
- Friend Widget: View the most recent message from a specific friend.
- Group Widget: View the most recent message from a group.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Bug Fixes and Enhancements
- Added Eraser to Drawing screen

在BF-Private Messenger上，您将拥有绝对私密的交流空间，您的任何聊天对话均受端到端加密保护，更有阅后即焚、截屏提醒等各种隐私保护功能，确保您的聊天安全。

【功能简介】

⁃ 保护隐私，所有数据均采用端到端加密，有效防止聊天内容泄露篡改；
⁃ 连通全球，支持多种语言切换，轻松与全球各地的人聊天交流；
⁃ 状态分享，设置当前状态，让好友了解您此刻的心情和正在做的事；
⁃ 简洁流畅，专注即时通信，提供安全稳定的聊天通信功能；
⁃ 酷趣圈子，与兴趣相投的人创建属于您们的圈子，感受陪伴同行的力量；
⁃ 匿名树洞，抛开社交压力，匿名身份倾诉心事，吐槽烦恼；

⁃ 联系我们：bfsoftware2022@163.com

https://www.bitface.app/privacy.html   BF Messenger协议

apps.title: LoopMessage
apps.description:
LoopMessage is a perfect tool for messaging marketing. You can send personalized bulk messages via iMessage/SMS, WhatsApp, Telegram, and Threema in 4 steps:
1. Select recipients
2. Compose message
3. Choose the sending mode
4. Press "Start"
Easy peasy, right?


Advantages of LoopMessage app:

- This is a 100% native iOS app with a minimal UI and maximum performance
- App is built to run on iOS 11 and later.
- Sending will be done on your device from your accounts in iMessage, WhatsApp, Telegram, Threema.
- LoopMessage app will not ask for passwords from your messengers, so you can be sure that your accounts are safe.
- Also, you can send regular SMS from your device. Note that SMS is sent from your device based on your cellular provider rates.


LoopMessage offers great user data privacy:

- App stores all data only on your device, without using external servers.
- You can deny access to the phone book and use only internal contacts in the app. Thus, your personal contacts will not be known to the app.
- If you have allowed access to the phone book, the app will work only in Read-only mode with your Phone Book. The app will never make changes to the Phone Book since the main goal of the application is to distribute messages without making changes in contacts.


What are the benefits of using LoopMessage for bulk distribution?

- By sending messages via iMessage, your customers will receive authentic blue chat bubble messages with modern previews.
- You can send a message via iMessage by specifying the recipient's e-mail. If he has an iCloud account created on this mail, he will also receive a message.
- If you need to send messages to recipients in different countries, now you don't have to worry about roaming for SMS, since messaging via iMessage, WhatsApp, Telegram, and Threema does not depend on your cellular provider.


Who using our product?

- iOS/macOS-only app owners. This way, they have a 100% relevant audience of users who already have iMessage installed. For other platforms, they can send messages via WhatsApp or Telegram.
- People who provide personalized services and need to be in touch with their clients. For example, teachers, fitness trainers, consultants are those who need to constantly stay in touch with their audience and send messages every day. Previously these people spent several hours a day on messaging, but now they can do it in 5 minutes.
- Business owners who are constantly trying to notify their customers about product updates, new sales, and promotions, or any other event that may be of interest to their audience.

Terms of Uses: https://loopmessage.com/app-terms
Privacy Policy: https://loopmessage.com/app-privacy

apps.title: Zalo
apps.description:
(Vietnamese below) Zalo is the new market-leading messaging app with amazing features. 

* Rich feature set:
=> Message your friend in a snap. Receive notifications the moment they reply back.
=> Express your emotion with fun and cheerful emoticons and stickers.
=> Send voice messages with fantastic quality and no outside noises
=> Find and get acquainted with friends nearby.
=> Send group messages easily with no effort.
=> Discover and play games with your friends.
=> Share your location.
=> High level of privacy.


Download Zalo and chat with your friends!

Terms of Use: https://zalo.vn/dieukhoan/

Support Information:
- Online: https://zalo.me/zalohotroiOS
- Email: feedback@zalo.me
- Website: https://zalo.me

---

Zalo là ứng dụng nhắn tin kiểu mới và kết nối cộng đồng hàng đầu cho người dùng di động Việt.
* Zalo có điều gì đặc biệt?
=> Tốc độ gửi tin nhắn cực nhanh, bạn luôn nhận được thông báo khi có tin nhắn mới kể cả khi không mở ứng dụng.
=> Thể hiện cảm xúc với emoticon và hình động vui nhộn.
=> Nhắn tin lời nói với chất lượng âm thanh nén rõ ràng, không tạp âm, không méo tiếng.
=> Kết nối bạn với những người thú vị xung quanh nơi bạn ở.
* Chat với bạn bè, gửi tin nhắn nhóm trong danh bạ thật dễ dàng (chat, sms, voice, photo, games).
* Gặp gỡ với những người bạn thú vị trên Phòng Trò Chuyện hoặc Xung quanh nơi bạn ở.
* Chia sẻ những khoảnh khắc ngay tức thì với gia đình và bạn bè.
* Chia sẻ vị trí.
* An toàn và riêng tư.

Hãy kích hoạt Zalo và chat ngay với bạn bè trong danh bạ!

Thỏa thuận dịch vụ: https://zalo.vn/dieukhoan/

Hỗ trợ người dùng:
- Trực tuyến: https://zalo.me/zalohotroiOS
- Email: feedback@zalo.me
- Website: https://zalo.me

apps.title: Messenger AI for WA & More
apps.description:
Upgrade Your Messaging Experience with Messenger AI for WA
Integrating the best of WhatsApp Web, Telegram Web, and Line Web into one seamless platform, this app is designed for both personal and professional use on iPhone and iPad. Powered by cutting-edge AI features, Messenger for WA Web transforms communication into a smarter, faster, and more productive experience.

Key Features
Beyond Basic Messaging
Combine the power of WhatsApp Web, Telegram Web, and Line Web into one intuitive platform.

Multiple Accounts, One Device
Effortlessly access multiple accounts for WhatsApp Web, Telegram Web, and Line on both iPhone and iPad.

AI Translate
Translate voice or text messages in real-time across 50+ languages, directly within your messaging apps.

AI Notes
Capture quick notes and supercharge them with AI. Rewrite, summarize, rephrase, fix grammar, and more with just a tap.

Chat Analysis
Upload your WhatsApp chats and get detailed insights, including interactive stats and a “Wrapped” feature for sharing fun highlights on your stories.

AI Response Generator
Handle tough conversations effortlessly with AI-generated responses, all through a user-friendly interface.

Create Doc Links
Share photos and documents instantly by converting them into high-quality, shareable links.

Smart AI Messaging
Elevate your conversations with AI-crafted responses, helping you communicate effectively and professionally.

Stay Ahead of the Curve
Perfect for business or personal use, Messenger for WA Web ensures you’re always at the forefront of modern communication.

Pricing
Weekly: $2.99
Monthly: $9.99
Yearly: $29.99

For suggestions or support, contact us at: support@multiaccountmessenger.com
Privacy Policy: https://multiaccountmessenger.com/privacy_policy.html
Terms of Use: https://multiaccountmessenger.com/termsandconditions.html

Take your messaging to the next level.
Download Messenger AI for WA now and start your next-generation messaging journey today!

apps.title: Group Text | Mass Message
apps.description:
Group Text is an easy, user-friendly, time-saving and well-designed app enabling individual text messages to a group of contacts at once. Easily create & change your groups.  Quickly search your groups/contacts. Possibility to select multiple numbers per contact. Use “template” feature to instantly send recurrent content to your groups. When using Group Text you should abide by local regulations on sending out mass text messages. Please ensure that all recipients have provided prior consent. 

There is no advertising in the App!

GROUPS FEATURES
• Import your existing iCloud groups at first use
• Create your own groups: Family, Friends, Colleagues…
• Change your groups by assigning/removing contacts
• Already assigned contacts/numbers are always marked
• Use “Select All” feature to assign all your contacts at once 
• Enabling multiple numbers selection per contact
• The total number of contacts is always shown for each group
• Easily find your groups or contacts to be assigned/removed
• Display order of contacts in line with your device settings
• Newly created groups are always highlighted for easy access 

TEXT MESSAGING
• Instantly send text message to your groups
• Quickly add/remove contacts before sending

TEMPLATES
• Create predefined templates for your recurrent contents
• Instantly send text message by selecting a template
• Edit the selected template before sending if needed

AVAILABLE IN 15 DIFFERENT LANGUAGES
English, Nederlands, Français, Deutsch, Español,  Italiano, Português , 中文 (Simplified), 中文 (Traditional), 日本語, 한국어, , Русский, Türkçe, العربية, עברית

UPGRADE TO PREMIUM VERSION THROUGH IN-APP PURCHASE
• Create unlimited groups
• Split big groups
• Personalize your text messages with tags (firstname, lastname, company)
• Send to more than 5 contacts at once
• Send using templates
• Create your own templates

SUPPORT
• Integrated support functionality & FAQ
• Submit bugs and issues directly from the App
• 24/7 availability

COMING SOON
• Smart filters for contacts
• Reminders for planned sendings
• Update contact details directly from the App
• Share groups
• iCloud sync through all your devices
• 3D Touch options
• And much more...

Feel free to propose awesome functionalities! 

NOTES
* If you have iMessage turned on, the App will use it to send out group texts.

You can find our Terms of Service here: 
https://masstextapp.s3.amazonaws.com/TOS.txt

apps.title: Berkanan Messenger
apps.description:
Berkanan is what people nearby are talking about right now. Join the conversation. Discover interesting people. From festivals to conferences and college campuses, Berkanan is there.

Berkanan is a Bluetooth-powered group messaging app. It gives people a way to communicate in situations with poor or no cellular connectivity. Alongside group messaging, Berkanan also allows private one-to-one encrypted messaging. The range for these messages is about 70 meters, but if there are people between you and your intended recipient with the app installed, Berkanan can send messages further by going through other users' devices.

FEATURES
• Nearby Messaging: Chat with people nearby. Send public and private messages.
• P2P: Messages travel from device to device.
• Offline: Works offline, only with Bluetooth. No need for Wi-Fi or cellular connectivity.
• Notifications: Works in the background. Get notified of nearby users and messages.
• No Account: Use it without the need to register for an account.

PREMIUM FEATURES
• Edit Profile: Add personality to your profile.
• Turn Off Ads

Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase. Offers and pricing subject to change without notice.

Terms of Use: https://berkanan.chat/terms
Privacy Policy: https://berkanan.chat/privacy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Fixes an issue that could cause users not to appear in Nearby. Thank you, Michael!
• Fixes an issue that caused the user private message notification content extension's height to shrink after being displayed.

Love using the app? Invite your friends! Rate us!

apps.title: Arc -The Intelligent Messenger
apps.description:
Live Your Own Story

The Intelligent Messaging App
for the NextGen

Arc is the intelligent messaging app for the next generation, built on the principles of being Accessible, Reliable, and Confidential. Inheriting the strong foundation of Nocturne, Arc has evolved to offer a new standard in secure communication.

TRUE PRIVACY FOR EVERYONE
Arc provides end-to-end encryption (E2EE) for all users, including those on the free plan. This ensures your messages are completely secure and can only be read by you and the recipient. Ultimate peace of mind and freedom, in your hands.

CORE PHILOSOPHY: IGNITE THE FIRE
In Arc, messages automatically disappear from all devices and servers after a specified period. Our "Ignite the Fire" philosophy sparks free and heartwarming communication, untethered from digital records. It's our wish for you to cherish every single conversation.

KEY FEATURES

Connect Anywhere
Our proprietary mesh network allows you to exchange messages with nearby users even without an internet connection. Stay connected with your loved ones during disasters or in areas with poor connectivity.

Richer Communication
Enhance your conversations with diverse features like ephemeral group chats, a show/hide read receipts feature (Premium), and our unique "Emo" expressions.

CONSTANT EVOLUTION
We transform your feedback into progress. Arc will continue to evolve with updates released approximately every two weeks, ensuring we always meet your needs.

OUR ROADMAP

On-Device AI: Scheduled for release starting in Q2 2026.

Tiered Security: Paid plans (Standard/Premium) will launch in Q2 2026 or later, with an advanced Intelligence Plan including the "AEGIS" feature to be introduced further down the line.

With the new Arc, express your true self with confidence and rediscover the joy of communication.

apps.title: Color Text Messages+ Customize Keyboard Free Now
apps.description:
This is the HOTTEST app to create colorful and rainbowful textings! 

------------------------------------------

apps.title: endlink® Secure Messenger
apps.description:
Every organization needs a secure texting and communication management solution.

In the healthcare industry, in particular, workers want a quick and easy way to communicate with their peers, but medical practices need to ensure HIPAA compliance when workers send messages containing Protected Health Information.

Enter endlink®. 

Here are a few of endlink®’s simple, but robust features. More are coming soon!

• The first tool of its type to offer AI-assisted message generation, replies, and editing.

• Security powerful enough to meet HIPAA’s security and privacy standards (perfect for medical and a great fit for any other industry)

• Easy self-onboarding

• Message and media transmission as easy to use as any ordinary text messenger

• Message prioritization and automatic categorization

• Message-to-actionable task conversion

• Mass communication via sorting users into groups or locations

• On Call scheduling with escalated SMS/voice notifications

• Permission controls to determine who has access to what information

• Data stored solely in a secure environment, not on users’ mobile devices, so that terminated employees do not have access to secure information

• Interaction with the endlink® web client

• Scalability, allowing organizations of any size to make use of endlink®’s features

apps.title: Amtelco Secure Messages
apps.description:
Amtelco Secure Messages (formally known as miSecureMessages or MSM) is a robust, encrypted, two-way instant messaging application which enables messages to be sent securely from device to device. Amtelco offers a secure cloud-based or on-site directory solution. When you receive a notification from Amtelco Secure Messages, a Persistent Alert notifies you until you acknowledge the message. You can view messages and quickly send a secure reply. Amtelco Secure Messages protects sensitive information such as PHI and streamlines team collaboration, offering industries secure business messaging. Amtelco offers an easy implementation process in contact centers, enterprises, and healthcare. Users will appreciate a secure messaging solution which prioritizes speed and is user-friendly. Amtelco Secure Messages offers high priority messages to ensure every critical message is delivered quickly and clearly, keeping users connected with fast and reliable two-way communication.

Amtelco Secure Messages seamlessly integrates with your current systems, simplifying maintenance and support. Built with flexibility and customization in mind, Amtelco Secure Messages effortlessly adjusts to your evolving IT setup. With our responsive development and support teams located in the US, you'll experience reduced training and troubleshooting time, ensuring smooth operations.

Contact centers gain from the extensive reporting, trackability, and interoperability Amtelco Secure Messages offers. Featuring clearly documented read receipts, administrators stay informed about the delivery, opening, and reading of crucial messages, holding their teams accountable. Enjoy peace of mind, knowing messages are delivered swiftly and securely through Amtelco Secure Messages.

Key Features:
- End-to-end encryption
- Off-device message storage
- Group messaging
- Persistent alerts (SMS escalation) and push notifications
- Send attachments (photos, videos, and audio recordings)
- Intuitive interface
- Voice-to-text mode (Dictation)
- HIPAA and HITECH compliant
- Remote disabling if a device is lost or stolen
- Tracking and Reporting
- High-priority sounds
- Critical Alerts
- Personal, Group, or System quick phrases
- Single sign-on (SSO) and Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) authentication
- Works on mobile data and WiFi
- View the status of contacts instantly (online, offline, do not disturb)
- Configure Circles for fast access to the right contacts (Circles can be configured by the user and by administrators)
- Complete activity audit trails
- Easy reporting and analytics
- Third-party integration via API (Contact us for more information)
- Replaces pagers and unsecured SMS
- Auto-replies and away messages
- Optional reply modes: No Reply, Reply to Sender, and Reply All
- Device consolidation and Bring Your Own Device (BYOD)

For more information, contact Amtelco at 800-356-9148 or e-mail info@misecuremessages.com.

New phone or device? Re-install the Amtelco Secure Messages app and login with your existing Amtelco Secure Messages credentials. If you don’t know what your login credentials are, contact your Amtelco Secure Messages system administrator or Certified Provider. This may be your answering service, contact center, or your main point of contact within your organization for Amtelco Secure Messages.
Requires a connection to cloud-based or on-site Amtelco Secure Messages solution provided by Amtelco.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Added an optional ‘Dismiss’ button for the ‘attachment file size exceeded’ notification.
Adjusted the ‘Reply as: (username)’ button to be simply ‘Reply’ for a non-role based group.
Added resources for enhancing retry requests within the app.
Replaced remaining system alerts with ASM alerts and created a 3-option ASM alert when appropriate.
Created a reusable Floating Action button view within the app.
Enhanced the app code relative to sending and receiving of attachments.
Increased the padding at the bottom of Away messages to visually differentiate multiple Away messages.
Adjusted the Dialer textbox to be easier locate and tap if no numbers had been entered.
Implemented the ability for the app to link street addresses.
Various fixes and improvements.

apps.title: Project Broadcast
apps.description:
We understand the importance of making personal connections and having real relationships. Project Broadcast allows you to reach more people in your network while maintaining that personal connection you know is important.  

Project Broadcast allows you to manage your contacts as well as group them in any way you want using our innovative tagging strategy.  Tags can be long lasting mechanisms for grouping or a quick way to group that is temporary and easily removed.  You also have the ability to create and manage templates so that while building campaign messages, broadcasting to a group, or just replying to a message you can quickly leverage a template and prevent those duplicate messages we all hate sending over and over.  Our campaigns allow you to prepare messages that are delivered to your recipients automatically.  Joining a campaign can be done manually by you adding contacts or groups of contacts via tags to the campaign or you can leverage our keyword feature.  Keywords are simple, small, rememberable text words you can have people text to your Project Broadcast number that automates so much!  You can auto reply to a keyword (with optional delay).  You can auto tag contacts who text the keyword.  You can also have contacts who text the keyword be automatically placed in campaigns!  

With all the power of Project Broadcast we also know how important it is for you to share that creative spirit you use to create such engaging campaigns.  Because of that we also have a Bundles feature!  You can create a bundle and attach as many campaigns and templates as you like so you can share that bundle with another Project Broadcast user!  This lets your efforts scale to multiple users.

Need to quickly send a message to a group of contacts?  Easy!  With Project Broadcast you can Broadcast a message immediately or set it for a future time.  Your messages, campaigns, replies on keywords, etc can also leverage our cutting edge dynamic fields so your messages feel even more personal to the recipient.  Project Broadcast is the tool for the job when you want to have a real conversation with the recipient and you are hoping your broadcasted messages or campaigns create a dialogue with the recipients. 

We are excited for you to use Project Broadcast!  #startBroadcasting

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Back Office inbound email notifications.
- Global Do Not Message for blocking specified states/provinces.
- Miscellaneous enhancements, bug fixes, and performance improvements.

apps.title: Just Tap Send
apps.description:
Just Tap Send takes the pain out of sending messages when you're in a rush, by letting you quickly fire off pre-typed messages to your favorite contacts.

Designed for quick, one-handed, thumb-tapping use. Simply Tap to select a person, Tap to select a message, Tap send, and you're done.

With Just Tap Send you can quickly send text messages, iMessages, emails or make phone calls.

Start by bookmarking the people you message the most, then enter the messages you might want to send them. Now you're all set for the next time you're in a rush.

Get organized by grouping your contacts in any way you want, then fire off messages to everyone in the group with just three taps.

Make your messages as personal or as generic as you want, with Individual and Global templates. Global templates show up for everyone — they help cut down on repetition, and with template variables you can add a personal touch.

Your templates and favorites stay in sync across all your devices with iCloud, and on iPad you can use slide-over or split view to super-charge your messaging.

As "OctoberCrow1" put it in her 5-Star review — Be the envy of your texting friends by being a frequent & fun communicator, without a huge time investment ... Highly recommended!

Just–Tap–Send — and you're done — Making life just a little bit easier.

— 

Price — Just Tap Send requires an in-app purchase for lifetime access or a monthly/yearly subscription. A fully functional, no-commitment trial is included, so you can try out Just Tap Send for free — Happy Tapping.

Privacy Policy — https://justtapsend.com/privacypolicy/
Terms of Use — https://justtapsend.com/terms-of-use/

For help, problems, suggestions or comments please get in touch via the app or at https://JustTapSend.com/Help/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
It's time for a spring clean, with lots of under-the-hood fixes, improved support for iOS18 and a small change to our name — Just Tap Send, the template-based messaging app that lets you quickly fire off pre-typed messages to your favorite contacts — perfect for when you are in a rush.

If you have any problems, suggestions or comments please get in touch at https://JustTapSend.com/Help. If you like Just Tap Send, then a review would be very much appreciated, they are the lifeblood of independent app developers like myself and they help other people choose great apps. Thank you for your support.

apps.title: Litstick - Best Stickers App
apps.description:
Look no further than Litstick, the ultimate message app for sending funny stickers and making jokes with your friends in a whole new way! Are you tired of sending the same boring texts to your friends? Want to add some humor and personality to your messages? 


With Litstick, you can easily light up your conversations with virtual stickers, creating unique and engaging messages that are sure to make your friends smile. Choose also from a wide variety of hilarious stickers, including animals, celebrities, memes, and more, to spice up your messages and express your creativity.


With our innovative "mimic messages" feature, you can have a laugh with your friends and family by editing message conversations that will leave them scratching their heads. 
But Litstick can do much more! Need to break the ice with that cutie you just met on a dating app? With LitStick you can send fun stickers to get them chatting and relax the conversation. 


But that's not all. Litstick also offers a variety of bugs and glitches that you can add to your messages to surprise and delight your friends. These little surprises are sure to keep your conversations fresh and exciting.


Whether you want to add humor to your daily conversations, create a memorable moment with friends and family, or simply express your creativity, Litstick has you covered. Download Litstick now and take your message chats to a whole new level of fun!

Litstick also offers a Litstick+ subscription that provides additional features and benefits, including access to exclusive stickers and bug designs, ad-free experience, and more. Upgrade now and enhance your Litstick experience!

Terms of Service: https://stickered.page.link/terms

apps.title: Yelling
apps.description:
We, humans, have natural ways to communicate. We say things to each other in private, then we forget over time. Yelling is here to do that digitally.

Yelling is fully encrypted end-to-end. All your messages, whether it's a 1:1 chat or a group chat, are fully encrypted in-transit or at rest.

Yelling does NOT store your messages, not on the server side, and not on the client side. You can choose to store messages for 1, 7 or 30 days. After which, the messages are gone. There are no permanent storage options.

Yelling does not store metadata. Metadata often reveals more than the contents of the messages themselves. Yelling prefer not to know that. Once a message is delivered, no other info about the message is kept.

Yelling does not require a phone number. You should be able to chat with others without disclosing your phone number.

You can register on Yelling with an email address. And you can disable people's ability to find you by email.

Yelling is not designed for viral growth. It is not easy for people to find you. You can invite or connect with friends with a unique link or QR code. Yelling is designed so that only your friends can find you.

Yelling is open-source. We believe secure apps should be transparent in how they work. Yelling is free. No ads. Yelling does not collect or sell data.

apps.title: Remes: Deleted Messages
apps.description:
"Words fade, but messages remain." In today’s fast-paced digital world, your conversations matter. Whether it’s an important business chat, a heartfelt message, or a quick note, keeping track of your messages has never been more essential.

Remes enhances your messaging experience with powerful features:
