apps.title: Scrollit - Visual Messenger
apps.description:
We support Ukraine

Scrollit turns your iPhone or iPad into an L.E.D. message display board. ScrollIt will help you tell your friends, colleagues, or anyone something - when they can’t hear you: at a club, concert, class, meeting, lecture, or even a restaurant. 

Just type your message and hit Display, and ScrollIt will scroll the message large enough for everyone around to see. 

What adds to the fun is that ScrollIt offers easy-to-type emoticons right from the same keyboard. Make your text even more fun to watch!

The phone vibrates quietly to let you know when the message has finished. (Replaced with a short beep on iPod Touch and iPad.) 

Some of the reviews by ScrollIt customers:

Great app 5-STARS
by Benji897765 - Version 1.2 - Jun 6, 2014
Works well, easy to use interface. If you want an app for scroll texts, this is the one you want.

Happy 5-STARS
by SpaceSkunk - Version 1.2 - Jun 5, 2014
This app does everything I expected and my kids love it when I'm cheering for them.

ScrollIt features: 
• Simple yet powerful design with no confusing buttons or switches 
• Emoticons from the same keyboard
• Unlimited message length 
• Mini live preview for easy color and speed selection
• Short vibration at the end of scrolling  
• Right-to-left display for Arabic or Hebrew
• Two L.E.D. shapes: round and square 
• Recently-used message list with one-tap access 

Want to use hundreds more emoticons in ScrollIt? From your iPhone Settings App, choose General -> Keyboard -> Keyboards -> Add New Keyboard,  and select Emoji from the list. In ScrollIt, tap the globe button at the bottom left of the keyboard to switch to Emoji and back. 

Use ScrollIt for: 
• Flirting: display messages to people at the disco, bar, or other crowded places.
• Talk to your friends at school or college: send your visual message up to 50 feet across a classroom. 
• Cheer at a concert or sports event: that rock star or your favorite player deserves to know how you feel!
• In the office: get rid of unwanted visitors without even talking to them.
• If you can't or don't want to talk: you’re sick or in a bad mood.
• Just to be cool: we guarantee you’ll be popular anywhere with ScrollIt! 

If this is not enough for you, you can try our ScrollIt 2X. It has more features and capabilities.

We’re constantly improving ScrollIt, and we value our users’ opinions. If you want to send us your feedback or you have a problem with the app, please contact us via our support page before submitting a review to the App Store. Remember that we can probably solve your problem, but we cannot respond to reviews. Thank you.

apps.title: Symphony Messaging
apps.description:
Symphony Messaging is the leading secure and compliant messaging platform built for global finance. Accelerate internal and external workflows with confidence and reduce the risk of off-channel communication through the platform’s redundant architecture, borderless community and interoperability with critical applications that simplify and streamline complex tasks.
With the Symphony Messaging mobile app, conversations continue away from the desk - offering flexibility to securely connect with everyone you need, while on the move. 

Community
• Connect with a community of over half a million users, both internally and externally, while maintaining global organizational controls.

Federation
• Compliance-enabled mobile communication across key external networks such as WhatsApp, WeChat, SMS, LINE, and voice.
• Symphony Virtual Numbers provide employees a convenient, centralized and compliance-friendly hub for communication across mobile voice, SMS and messaging applications.

Compliance
• Active surveillance, data loss protection, and internal/external expression filters.


Security
• Secure data with standard end-to-end encryption, and flexible hardware and cloud-based deployment options.

Stability
• Redundant architecture and real-time monitoring ensures continuity of critical financial workflows.

Symphony is a communication and markets technology company powered by interconnected platforms: messaging, voice, directory and analytics.

The modular technology - built for global finance - enables over 1,000 institutions to achieve data security, navigate complex regulatory compliance and optimize business interactions.

apps.title: WhatsText Send Direct Message
apps.description:
Say goodbye to the inconvenience of saving numbers before chatting now enjoy the freedom of direct messaging. If you’re curious to know how you can start a WhatsApp conversation with any random number, that’s not saved in your Phonebook? Well, your search ends here! 

WhatsText Send Direct Message app is the best tool to start chatting on WhatsApp, Viber, Botim and all other messaging apps without saving the number. 

Now you can initiate the conversation with an unsaved number, without saving their contact details in the phonebook. Whether it is a local or international number, users can get in touch with anyone globally with just a few taps.

Features:

● Message Without Saving Numbers: 
Our app revolutionizes the way you communicate by allowing you to send messages to any number on WhatsApp and other messaging platforms without having to save the contact. This feature is especially beneficial for businesses that need to reach out to multiple unknown clients or leads. You can efficiently send messages to numerous recipients without cluttering your Phonebook, making it easier to manage communications. 

●  Text Anyone Worldwide:
Connect directly with people from any country. Our app supports direct chatting with individuals in across almost all nations, enabling you to bypass geographical barriers. Whether you’re coordinating with international partners, expanding your network, or simply reaching out to friends and family abroad, our app ensures that distance is never an issue.

● Maintain History:
Keep your communication organized and accessible with our history management feature. The app automatically maintains a log of all the contacts you've interacted with, providing you with a comprehensive view of your messaging activity. This feature not only helps you track your interactions but also allows you to easily manage your contact history by deleting specific numbers from the history tab. 

WhatsText Send Direct Message app makes it easy for you to text a phone number with add it to your contact list.
 We provide the best tool to make your communication easier and more efficient.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Text changes that provide clearer information about features.
- Additional New Features 
- Bug fixes 

We regularly update our app to fix bugs, improve performance, and add new features to help you chat without saving numbers.

apps.title: DialMyCalls: Mass Text & Voice
apps.description:
DialMyCalls is your go-to solution for mass communication. Send mass text messages, voice broadcasts, and emergency alerts in seconds. Whether you're a business, school, church, or community leader, you have the tools to communicate quickly, clearly, and affordably.

What You Can Do

Send high-volume text messages using our intuitive mass texting platform.

Broadcast voice messages to thousands with our voice broadcast app

Use the free version to message up to 25 contacts weekly — perfect for small groups

Schedule automated text messages and voice calls for future delivery

Set up auto-reply texts and SMS auto-response messages

Group your contacts to send targeted SMS and voice messages

Access mass calling features with voicemail drop if calls go unanswered

Use Cases
Schools and Educators - Share emergency notifications, closure alerts, and event reminders with parents, staff, and students using our school text messaging tools
Businesses and Enterprises - Send time-sensitive SMS alerts for internal updates, shift changes, and operations
Churches and Faith Groups - Notify members of service times, fundraisers, or prayer meetings with group texts and automated voice calls
HOAs and Residential Communities - Share maintenance notices, event updates, or urgent alerts with mass SMS and voice messages
Events and Conferences - Manage guest lists and send reminders or updates for weddings, conferences, and local gatherings
Emergency Services - Distribute emergency notifications instantly with our mass call and text broadcast features
Healthcare Providers - Send appointment reminders, health updates, and vaccination alerts using SMS and auto-reply messaging
Marketing and Promotions - Promote flash sales, special offers, and new products with mass text campaigns
Contractors and Service Providers - Keep customers informed with text alerts for appointments, updates, and service delays
Training and Workshops - Notify attendees of schedule changes, materials, and logistics with group texting and auto-response features

How It Works
Type or record a message. Select your contacts. Send or schedule instantly. Unanswered voice calls go directly to voicemail.

Flexible Access
Everything syncs in real time across mobile and desktop.

Secure and Private
DialMyCalls keeps your data safe. We never sell your contact information. All communications are encrypted and compliant with leading data standards.

Why We’re Different

Free to get started — message up to 25 contacts weekly

Pay-as-you-go pricing with no subscriptions or contracts

Works as a business texting platform or emergency notification system

Includes voicemail drop, push-to-talk, and press-1 calling options

Supports message scheduling, auto-replies, and two-way texting

Works with landline texting and web-to-phone broadcasting

Offers real-time delivery reports, opt-out management, and voice logs

Trusted by over 40,000 organizations nationwide

US-based support available 7 days a week

Need help? Call 1-800-928-2086 or visit DialMyCalls.com to learn more.

Terms of Service: https://www.dialmycalls.com/termsofservice
Privacy Policy: https://www.dialmycalls.com/privacypolicy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Free Trial Enhancements
A new persistent banner shows how many days are left in your free trial and makes upgrading easier than ever.

- Improved Onboarding Experience
Onboarding has been completely redesigned with instant phone number setup and clearer, guided steps.

- Text-to-Speech Upgrades
New “Preview” button lets you listen before sending.
Expanded support for 10 new languages: French, Chinese, German, Korean, Portuguese (Brazilian), Italian, Japanese, Dutch, Danish.
Customize speech speed and use up to 2000 characters.

- Smarter App Behavior
The app now unregisters old push tokens when you log out to prevent receiving messages from another account.

- Better Recording & Contact Management
Contact imports now show a progress bar for better visibility.
You can now search through your past recordings.
Recording list has been improved for clarity and consistency.

- Fixes & Performance
Fixed layout issues with the recording modal and phone links.
Character count for messages now matches the website exactly.
Background upgrades to core libraries for speed and stability.

apps.title: MediMobile Messaging
apps.description:
MediMobile Messaging is a free secure text messaging application for healthcare professionals and can be used by physicians, hospital administrators, nurses, and medical billers to ensure that communication between the entire healthcare team is simple, secure and fast. MediMobile Messaging allows providers to send unlimited secure text messages and photo messages. MediMobile Messaging can be implemented quickly and easily by any member of your health care team for free! MediMobile Messaging can be implemented in a hospital, clinic or any healthcare setting to promote collaboration and communication. MediMobile Messaging can be used not only for text and picture messaging between individuals, but also for group messaging. Additionally, this software is cross-platform, meaning it can be used from a smartphone, a tablet, or a web portal! MediMobile Messaging is the most reliable free secure messaging solution available for healthcare professionals.

Features:
-Secure Text Messaging
-Secure Photo Messaging
-Group Messaging
-Cross-Platform
-“Read” Notification System

apps.title: YEO Messaging
apps.description:
YEO is a next-generation secure, private messaging platform that authenticates not just the device, but the intended recipient using continuous facial recognition. So you can decide who views your content, as well as where and when they see it. 

Today, businesses and individuals are using private messaging more and more, but most popular messaging platforms do not meet compliance or legal requirements for business use… and though we rely on trust, we lose control of our content the moment we hit ‘send’. Until now....

YEO Messaging is currently available for individual users who want to know that the messages, files and media they share are secure, private, and only being viewed by the intended recipient, whether that’s a private picture or sensitive documents. As well as end-to-end encryption and geofencing features, we’re the only app of our kind to use continuous facial recognition to verify not just the device, but the person looking at it. 

YEO Pro and YEO for Business will be launching soon - watch the space! 

Features:

- Compliant and reliable security: YEO offers a real solution for businesses (and individuals) who want to reclaim control over their data.

- Verify the person as well as the device: Continuous facial recognition authenticates the person looking at the device… so only the intended recipient can view your messages.

- Geofence technology: Apply a geofence to your messages, allowing you to control where and when they are viewed.

- Control over your content: Nothing can be downloaded, forwarded, screengrabbed or shown to anyone else without your permission. 

- Encryption, elevated: Encryption isn’t optional. We use cutting-edge end-to-end encryption technology to secure all messages from the moment they’re sent to the point that the recipient’s face has been verified. 

YEO (pronounced ‘Yo’, and an acronym for Your Eye Only) was founded by a team of technology, security and design specialists. Disturbed by the lack of trust in existing messaging platforms - particularly in a business setting -they developed their own, packed with features that place control into the hands of the user, and not the platform owner. 

YEO has not been designed to run properly on iPad. 

For more information, see our Terms of Use https://yeomessaging.com/terms-of-use/ and Privacy Policy https://yeomessaging.com/privacy-policy/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
What’s New in Version 3.0.15
We’ve been working hard behind the scenes to improve your YEO Messaging experience.
In this update, we’ve addressed various bugs to improve stability and performance.

Thanks for using YEO Messaging!
We’re constantly working to make the app better and your feedback is always welcome.

Enjoy Live sketching, Live animated photos and selfies, Video and Audio Messages. Get closer to your friends, sharing some great moments together.

With Quickie you can connect instantly - Messages are sent when you finish typing (no need to press send!), and disappear automatically once viewed!. You can express yourself naturally, just like in real conversation.

Quickie helps you focus on the people that matter, keeping a fast, private and intimate connection with the people you care most about.

apps.title: Supertext Messenger
apps.description:
Stay Connected Anywhere, Anytime!
Supertext seamlessly combines online chats and offline SMS messaging, enabling group conversations with friends, family, and colleagues—no matter your internet connection, data budget or phone model.

KEY FEATURES

OFFLINE MESSAGING
Out of data or unstable internet? No problem! Supertext automatically switches to free SMS in your chats, so you can send and receive group messages while offline. This feature works with Telkomsel, Indosat and Smartfren, ensuring that you stay connected anytime, anywhere, whether you’re communicating online or via SMS.

GROUP CHATS FOR EVERYONE

apps.title: kChat Messenger - chat safely
apps.description:
kChat is a FREE messaging app that puts kids’ safety first. kChat combines the fun and freedom of messaging with complete protection and safety to meet the needs of both kids and parents.



Safety Through Full Parental Control
  - Parents have complete control over the app from a password-protected settings page
  - Only parents can accept friend requests
  - Only parents can add friends
  - Friends can only be added if they belong to a known group

Kids Don't Need Their Own Number or Device
  - Only parents' phone numbers are used
  - Kids can safely use their parents' devices as the settings area is password protected. Plus, any number of kids can be added on a single device. 

Easy to Use
  - kChat has a simple user interface and easy navigation – which is great for parents too!
  - Larger text for beginner readers
  - Clever use of icons and voice messages means kids don't have to be able to read yet
  - Recommended for children ages 5+

Kids Stay Connected
  - kChat is a great way for kids to stay in touch with friends and family

Get Creative
  - Kids aren't limited to text messaging
  - They can also draw and share their masterpieces with contacts
  - Fun, animated stickers help express themselves
  - Taking photos or sending images from their gallery is another convenient feature

100% FREE and NO ADS
  - Download is free
  - No subscription fees now – or any time later
  - No in-app ads

Multiplatform and Multilingual
  - kChat can be used on both smartphones and tablets
  - It is available in English, Spanish, and Hebrew – with more languages coming soon!

Your Data Is Safe and Private
  - Your details, profiles, groups, messages, and media are all encrypted
  - We take your privacy seriously and will never give third parties access to your data

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Edit Groups Easily: You can now include friends’ children when editing groups.
• Customizable Avatar: Personalize your account with an editable avatar.
• Improved Translations: We’ve added missing translations and fixed some existing ones.
• Enhanced Haptic Feedback: Upgraded our haptic implementation for a more responsive feel.
• Faster Initial Load: Enjoy quicker startup times with improved loading performance.
• Account Deletion Progress: You’ll now see a progress dialog when deleting your account.
• Chat Navigation: The app will now remember and return you to your last chat conversation.
• Improved Push Notification System: We’ve enhanced how push notifications are managed for a smoother experience.

apps.title: Message Matrix
apps.description:
MessageMatrix is a business messaging solution allowing organisations to communicate with their customers securely and compliantly.

By bringing together voice, video and messaging with consumer mobile apps in one seamless platform, MessageMatrix secures your conversations that matter.

 
WHY MESSAGE MATRIX:

• SECURE: MessageMatrix automatically protects your messages and attachments from any attacks through end to end cloud-based encryption. 

• COMPLIANT: Be compliant with government and industry regulations surrounding digital communication.

• TRANSACTIONAL: Streamline your business processes by sharing documents and instantly authorising transactions using biometrics.

• BE WHERE YOUR CUSTOMERS ARE: MessageMatrix enables you to connect with prospective and current customers through their preferred messaging channel.

• ENHANCE RELATIONSHIPS: Strengthen your customer engagement through convenient and compliant, real-time conversations.

• SEAMLESS ENGAGEMENT: Safeguard your customer relationships without losing affinity during staff turnover.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
1. Adding new Pexip urls.

2. Bug fixes and improvements.

apps.title: Vama
apps.description:
Explore the future of communication with Vama – a cutting-edge app that seamlessly integrates instant messaging, incorporating the latest in Fintech technology.

INSTANT MESSAGING: Vama offers the fastest messaging app available in the market.

MULTI-DEVICE SYNC: Access your chats seamlessly from smartphones, tablets, and computers simultaneously. With Vama, your conversations are not tied to a single device—start typing on one and finish on another without missing a beat. Your data is always at your fingertips.

FUN: Express yourself with Vama’s powerful photo and video editing tools, themes, and emojis

RELIABLE: Engineered to deliver messages with utmost dependability, even on the most challenging network connections. With Vama, you can be sure that your messages are always delivered promptly and reliably.

SECURE: Your messages and data are protected by robust security measures, keeping your personal information secure and giving you peace of mind.

PRIVACY: At Vama, we take your privacy seriously. Rest assured, your personal conversations are handled with the utmost care, and we never compromise on safeguarding your private information. Your trust is our priority, and we are committed to ensuring a secure and confidential experience for all our users.

apps.title: News Plume (hidden messenger)
apps.description:
It looks like a News Reader but it secretly hides your confidential chats to make it impossible for prying eyes and hackers to discover your conversations.
The app allows you to receive discreet notifications of the messages that you receive disguised as news notifications, this way you are instantly aware of incoming messages while keeping your conversations fully private.
Now you can discuss any topic and receive disguised notifications. Have you ever been worried about someone checking your phone and getting access to your conversations? Using News Plume finally allows you to have private and hidden conversations while still receiving notifications.

Features:

- Divert snoopers from accessing your private conversation by using a hidden pattern while on the News Reader
- Feature complete discreet messaging (share pictures, react to messages, check latest visible time...)
- Messages are only accessible once you enter your pin code by double tapping on the clock in the News Reader to keep them away from curious eyes
- Notifications from received messages are using the News feed you selected so the content of the messages received are never displayed
- Space out notifications in time to prevent too many notifications being received
- Message auto delete
- The News Reader is updated every minute, giving you the opportunity to stay up-to-date with events while messaging
- The app is completely free to use!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Resolved the auto-delete message bug so your chats stay where they should.
- Fixed multiple crashes to make the app faster and more reliable.

apps.title: AnyTalk Messenger
apps.description:
With AnyTalk you can stay in touch with anyone, anytime and anywhere! Freely. You can call or send messages, send photo and video messages as well as voice messages, locations and contacts worldwide over WiFi or 3G. AnyTalk seamlessly syncs across your devices and can be used on phones and tablets.

CALLS AND VIDEO CALLS
You can now call any of your AnyTalk contacts for free, arrange group calls (for up to 4 people), including video calls, while being sure that all your data is secured with encryption. (iOS 8.1+)

SYNCHRONIZATION AND PRIVACY
AnyTalk is taking care about your convenience and privacy, so we sync chats history across your devices, but don’t store it on our servers. Your chats history is yours and no one else can read it.

USE DIFFERENT SIM CARDS
AnyTalk give you ability to tie different phone numbers for the same account. This way you can insure yourself from losing access to the account when you lost sim-card, as well as freely use AnyTalk while you travel around the globe and use different sim cards.

ENCRYPTION
You can enable end-to-end encryption for both new or existing chats. When encryption is enabled, all outgoing messages will be encrypted by special key and only participants who got this key can read conversation. The key generates on device of user who initiate encryption and must be transferred to other chat participant by meeting in person. This way our servers knows nothing about your encryption key, plus you will avoid any possibility of man-in-the-middle attack.

HIDDEN CHATS
Encrypted chats will help you when it comes to data transfer and secure communication. But if someone get physical access to your mobile device — let’s say your friend, or mother, or girlfriend — we've got you covered with hidden chats! Such chats protected by password you will set and hidden from both chat and contact lists.
Hidden chats is a private feature just for your usage, so no one knows that chat is hidden on your device — even your participant.

Hidden chats available on phones only, tablets are not supported.

For support please visit anytalkapp.com/support
9c91696931

raw_data.releaseNotes: Thanks for using our application! We regularly update it to make AnyTalk easier to use. Be sure to always install the latest version for a problem-free and effective experience.

apps.title: Pony Messenger
apps.description:
* Pony delivers once a day.

* Enjoy the space you need to have mindful, distraction-free correspondence that won't get buried under receipts, security codes, and notifications.

* Compose in a rich, modern editor that lets you express yourself with images, embedded links, and audio.

* Correspond on threads with individuals or groups.

# In-App Purchases

Pony is a self-funded project and is free to use. If you like Pony, you can contribute to its development. We offer the opportunity to make contributions on a recurring, monthly basis. Contributions will be billed to your Apple Account. Recurring contributions will auto-renew 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase.

# Legal

Privacy Policy: https://www.ponymessenger.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://www.ponymessenger.com/terms-apple

apps.title: AMSConnect
apps.description:
AMS Connect is a HIPAA compliant mobile application for critical and secure text messaging. Enhancing critical messaging workflows AMS Connect also integrates with American Messaging’s suite of critical messaging devices, providing reliable, secure, and redundant messaging. 
Key Features: 
- Send and receive secure text messages in compliance with HIPAA standards. 
- Pager Integration – Messages arrive on your pager, smartphone or both for redundancy and convenience. 
- Service Teams – Send a page to a service team or group. Adds backup and redundancy to the traditional “hand-off” or “pass around” pager with easy opt-in and opt-out of on-call pagers at any time. 
- Silent/Do Not Disturb Override – AMS Connect notifications can override “Silent” and “Do Not Disturb” phone settings when Critical Alerts are “Allowed” by the end-user.  
- Message Forwarding – Let your colleagues know who is covering you when off-duty and have your messages automatically forwarded to that person. 
- Availability Status – Set your status to let contacts know if you are available, bust or off duty and view the status of others. 
- Mobile & Web Accessibility – Access AMS Connect anytime, anywhere with device sync. 
- Read Receipts – See exactly if, and when your colleagues have read your messages with receipts. 
- Quick Messages - Quickly send commonly used messages by selecting from a list of pre-populated phrases or create your own. 
- Voice Notes – Record a voice message and send it securely within a conversation thread.  
- Photo & File Share – Safely send up to 5 photo and file attachments including PDF, Word, and Excel documents up to 28MB at a time. 
- Archived Messaging History – Ability to archive single, multiple or all messages (according to your organization’s retention policy). 
- Searchable Directory – Access a listing of professionals from your organization and message them directly. 
- Urgent Message – Alert your care team to critical information and events by sending an urgent message with a unique tone. 
- Critical Group Messaging – Privately and securely message individuals, teams, and other distribution groups. 
- Secure External Messaging – (enhanced feature) Send a HIPAA secure message or photo to anyone with a mobile phone. Secure external messages are encrypted conversations between an American Messaging user and an external user with a mobile device. No need to sign up and remember usernames and passwords. Just quick, easy secure communication.

apps.title: Messenger for Messages
apps.description:
In a fast-paced world where everyone is connected instantly, good communication is really important. Here's where our groundbreaking Messages App comes in. It's a smooth part of the system and ready to change how you send messages and talk to people. With a focus on efficiency, unlimited messaging, and various text messaging options, our app offers a comprehensive solution for your communication needs.

Unleash the Power of Messaging:

1. Seamless Message Sending:
Experience the thrill of sending messages that arrive in an instant. Our Messages App ensures that your communications flow effortlessly, making every exchange as smooth as a face-to-face conversation.

2. Unlimited Messaging:
Say goodbye to restrictions. Our app empowers you to send unlimited messages, allowing you to engage in meaningful conversations without worrying about message quotas.

3. Text Messaging, Redefined:
While text might be the foundation of messaging, our app takes it to the next level. Express yourself with an extensive range of fonts, formatting options, and text styles. Craft messages that capture your unique voice and personality.

4. Multimedia Integration:
Why confine yourself to text alone? Our Messages App lets you seamlessly integrate photos, videos, and audio messages into your chats. Share moments in all their visual and auditory glory, creating a richer and more immersive communication experience.

5. Intuitive Message Organization:
Keep track of meaningful conversations again. Our app intelligently organizes your messages, making it easy to find critical information and maintain a clear overview of your communication history.

6. Quick and Smart Search:
Looking for a specific message? Our robust search feature allows you to locate messages, contacts, and media with unparalleled speed and precision. Say goodbye to sifting through endless conversations to find what you need.

7. Personalized Messaging:
Make your messages stand out by using a variety of customizable themes, backgrounds, and stickers. Tailor your conversations to match your mood, the occasion, or your personal style.

8. Group Messaging Made Simple:
Coordinate group events, share updates, and engage in lively discussions effortlessly. Our Messages App streamlines group messaging, ensuring everyone stays on the same page without confusion.

9. Enhanced Security:
Rest easy knowing that state-of-the-art security measures protect your messages. Our app employs end-to-end encryption, ensuring that your private conversations remain truly private.

10. Cross-Device Synchronization:
Transition seamlessly between your devices without missing a beat. Our Messages App keeps your conversations synchronized, allowing you to pick up where you left off no matter the device.

With our Messages App, sending messages evolves into a dynamic and immersive experience. The power of unlimited messaging, enriched with multimedia and personalized options, is at your fingertips. Embrace the future of communication and download our app today.

Unlock the potential of messaging with the Messages App—Unlimited Messages, Text Messaging Brilliance, and Seamless Connectivity Converge.

Unlock the potential of messaging with the Messages App—Unlimited Messages, Text Messaging Brilliance, and Seamless Connectivity Converge.

apps.title: Raven: Slow Messaging
apps.description:
Introducing Raven. Where every message is a journey, not just a notification. In a world brimming with instant gratification, Raven invites you to slow down and savor the anticipation of communication. Our app transforms your messages into enchanting adventures, carried across a real-world map by a cast of charming characters, each with their own leisurely pace. Imagine your words being carefully transported by a diligent raven, an amiable alpaca, or even a whimsical wizard, making their way through digital landscapes to deliver your thoughts and feelings.

Raven is not just an app; it's a return to the art of letter writing, reimagined for the digital age. Here, the journey of your message is as significant as its content, turning each communication into a memorable experience. Await the arrival of your letter with bated breath, and experience the joy of reading it only once your chosen character reaches its destination.

Key Features:

• Choose Your Courier: Select from our eclectic mix of messengers.
• Real-World Map Navigation: Send and receive letters superimposed on a beautifully detailed map, tracing the path your messenger takes in real time.
• Delayed Gratification: Embrace the suspense and delight of waiting for your message to be delivered. The slower pace enhances the value and impact of each word exchanged.
• On-Time Reads: Messages can only be read once the messenger arrives, making each communication a unique and private event between sender and receiver.
• Simple, Intuitive Design: Easy to use, Raven allows you to focus on what's important – crafting meaningful messages for friends, family, or anyone you choose.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Just a few bugs gobbled up by a very silly Raven.

Caw caw. Happy flying.

apps.title: Messages: SMS & Text Messaging
apps.description:
The Messages App is a comprehensive communication platform designed to streamline your messaging experience. With a focus on efficiency, connectivity, and user convenience, this app combines a variety of communication tools into one cohesive interface. Whether you’re looking to send a quick text, set a reminder, or make a call, the Messages App has you covered.

Key Features

1. Dual Apps

Multiple Accounts: Manage and switch between multiple accounts seamlessly without logging out.
Separate Spaces: Keep personal and professional conversations distinct by using dual app instances.
Custom Settings: Customize notification settings, themes, and preferences independently for each account.

2. Direct Chat

Instant Messaging: Send and receive text messages instantly.
Media Sharing: Share photos, videos, voice messages, and documents with ease.
Group Chats: Create and manage group conversations for collaborative communication.
Quick Replies: Use pre-set responses for faster communication.

3. Direct Message

One-on-One Messaging: Engage in private conversations with contacts.
Message Encryption: Ensure privacy with end-to-end encryption for all direct messages.
Read Receipts: Know when your messages have been read by the recipient.
Typing Indicators: See when the other person is typing a response.

4. Reminder

Set Reminders: Create reminders directly from your chat conversations.
Sync with Calendar: Integrate reminders with your calendar app for better task management.
Recurring Reminders: Set daily, weekly, or monthly reminders for regular tasks.
Notification Alerts: Get notified when a reminder is due.

5. Direct Calling

Voice Calls: Make high-quality voice calls directly from the app.
Video Calls: Connect face-to-face with video calling.
Call History: View and manage your call logs within the app.
Voicemail: Leave voice messages when calls are not answered.

6. Messages

Unified Inbox: Access all your messages in one place, including SMS, MMS, and app-based messages.
Search Functionality: Easily search through your messages to find specific conversations or keywords.
Message Organization: Organize messages by date, sender, or priority.
Starred Messages: Mark important messages for quick reference later.

Additional Features

Customizable Themes: Personalize the app with various themes and color schemes.

Notification Management: Control notification preferences for each type of message and call.

Contact Syncing: Sync your contacts from your phone, email, and other apps.

Spam Protection: Automatically filter out spam messages and calls.

Multi-Device Support: Access your messages and calls from multiple devices, ensuring you stay connected on the go.

The Messages App is your all-in-one communication hub, offering a range of features designed to enhance your messaging and calling experience. With its intuitive interface and robust functionality, staying in touch with friends, family, and colleagues has never been easier.

SUBSCRIPTION AND TERMS:

You may purchase an auto-renewing subscription through an In-App Purchase to enjoy all App Features without Ads:

• Auto-renewable subscription.

• Weekly ($2.99), 1 month ($4.99) and 1 year ($29.49) durations.

• Your subscription will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

• Current subscription may not be cancelled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.

Read our full Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy at:

* Link to Privacy Policy: https://messagestextmessage.blogspot.com/2024/07/privacy-policy.html

* Link to EULA: https://messagestextmessage.blogspot.com/2024/07/eula.html

* Link to Terms of use: https://messagestextmessage.blogspot.com/2024/07/terms-conditions.html

apps.title: LetterMe: Send Virtual Letters
apps.description:
LetterMe is a non-instant communication app that brings the experience of letter-sending to modern times.

Delivery time depends on the physical distance between sender and receiver, making each interaction special.

The goal is to provide a slower communication channel where people can have more meaningful conversations without the need to reply instantly.

Key features:

• You'll get a notification when someone sends you a letter, but you won't know their identity until it arrives.

• Customize Your Letters: Say goodbye to plain text – choose your preferred font and paper color to make your letters feel more special.

• Track your letters and watch them travel across the world until they reach their destination.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Thank you for using LetterMe! We update the app regularly to bring you the best possible experience. In this version, we’ve made the following changes:


• LetterMe Premium is now live!
• Brand new letter view.
• Improved onboarding flow.

apps.title: LIFT Messaging
apps.description:
LIFT® is a secure critical messaging application that combines the simplicity of traditional paging with the advanced technology of your iPhone.

Whether it is critical messages or automated system alerts, LIFT® has you covered.  You can increase your organization's efficiency while complying with HIPAA and HITECH.

LIFT® secures sensitive data, including PHI, by encrypting the data at rest as well as in transit. Access to LIFT® is restricted via a passcode or your iPhones biometric features. If a phone is lost or stolen, the account is easily disabled, there is no need for remote wipe since sensitive data is already secure; it is not stored on the device.

Messages can be originated from your existing infrastructure or using our secure standards based API.  Secure messages can also be sent between devices.  LIFT's® persistent alerting ensures you get the attention of the user.

LIFT® utilizes persistent notification and reliable messaging methods to deliver time sensitive critical messages.

LIFT® can send and receive high resolution images, and audio to provide richer message content.

Using LIFT® enables HIPAA and HITECH compliant critical messaging. 

Features include:
- Secure: HIPAA and HITECH standards.
- Global Coverage using WiFi and Cellular networks.
- Failover reliability with an additional messaging layer
- Does not store data on the device.
- Unlock LIFT® using a passcode or phones biometrics.
- Allows secure messaging device to device.
- Open Standards based API.
- Configurable persistent alert.
- Audit Trail; View when a message was sent, delivered and read. 
- Forward or Reply to messages you receive.
- Availability of canned, or free-form responses.
- Attach high-resolution photos, and audio.
- Contact Sync discovers which Contacts are already LIFT® users.

LIFT® provides you features of the pager you've reliably used for years, brought to your phone.

Requires a LIFT® secure messaging enabled account to use this application.

raw_data.releaseNotes: We are constantly working to improve your app experience with a number of bug fixes and security improvements.  Download today to keep up to date and secure.

apps.title: Duo Messenger
apps.description:
Duo Messenger is your go-to secure and private messaging app. Designed with privacy at its core, Duo Messenger cares about the security of your data, ensuring it remains inaccessible to anyone else.

- SECURE MESSAGE PRIVACY 
Duo Messenger is designed to prioritize your privacy. Your messages are encrypted end-to-end, guaranteeing that only you and your intended recipient can access them. Duo Messenger ensures that every message is safeguarded from illegal decryption or unauthorized access. Duo Messenger's advanced security measures always maintain the confidentiality and integrity of your communications at all times.

- GUARANTEE USER ANONYMITY
Duo Messenger is dedicated to providing complete anonymity to its users. Each user is given a unique Duo Number, which allows you to chat with others without revealing your phone number or email address. While you can access your account using your phone number or email, this information remains private and cannot be accessed by anyone else in any way.

- NO ADS, NO TRACKERS
Duo Messenger is completely ad-free, providing a smooth and clean user experience. You can enjoy uninterrupted and focused communication without the distraction of advertisements. Additionally, Duo Messenger does not track user activity within the app or share user data with third parties.

Customer Service: support@duomessenger.app
---
Terms: https://duomessenger.app/terms.html

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Bug fix

We're always excited to hear from you! Please feel free to contact us via email: support@duomessenger.app.

apps.title: Flex Messenger
apps.description:
Flex is a communication app with a focus on speed and security. It’s super-fast, simple, secure and free.

Flex seamlessly syncs across all of your devices and can be used on desktops, tablets and phones alike. You can send an unlimited amount of messages, documents of any type (.doc, .zip, .pdf, etc.), voice memos, images and videos. Flex groups doesn't have any limits.

Why use Flex?

• 100% FREE & NO ADS: Flex will be free forever. We are not going to sell any kind ads or introduce subscription fees.

• PRIVATE: No one can contact with you without knowing your exact contact information. Also we are not going to analyze or sell your social graph or any stats based on your communications.

• SECURE: We made it our mission to provide the best security among open people-friendly messengers.

• FAST: Flex also is very fast. We use newest technology for providing best communication speed.

• GROUP CHAT & SHARING: With Flex, you can form large group chats of any size, quickly share large documents (.doc, .ppt, .zip, etc.) and videos, and send an unlimited amount of photos to your partners.

• FREE CALLS: Make free phone and video calls with HD sound quality.

apps.title: Oh! Message
apps.description:
Encrypted chats and voice messages, Your Privacy, Our Duty.

•	Authentic: Your PRIVACY with Oh!Message is not a commercial propaganda, but a reality. 
•	Simple: we do not complicate your life- you do not need to customize your app setting to end your concerns about privacy. Everything is already customized to perfectly serve your privacy. We take you back to the time of simplicity in communicating with others…when no one was able to hear what you say or monitor what you write. In short, everything you say and write will be a bubble that will fly in the air and disappear as soon as you say/write it. 
•	Private: you do not need to delete messages as it will be automatically – and immediately- deleted by the app, after sending them by the sender and reading them by the recipient. We cannot see your messages because there will be no messages to see either in your account or in our servers. 
Encrypted chats and voice messages. 
In short, you will enjoy the most private app in the world. 
•	Free: No ads. No charges. 
•	Offline messages: when network is unavailable, you can still enjoy sending messages that will be kept in your account – not in our servers – until network is back.

apps.title: Link Messenger stories, calls
apps.description:
Link Messenger is neither sponsored by Signal nor affiliated with Signal.

Send and receive high-fidelity messages, participate in HD voice/video calls, and explore a growing set of new features that help you stay connected. Link’s advanced privacy-preserving technology is always enabled, so you can focus on sharing the moments that matter with the people who matter to you.


• Say anything – State-of-the-art end-to-end encryption keeps your conversations secure. Privacy isn’t an optional mode — it’s just the way that Link works. Every message, every call, every time.


• Go fast – Messages are delivered quickly and reliably, even on slow networks. Link is optimized to operate in the most constrained environment possible.


• Feel free – Link is a completely independent 501c3 nonprofit. Development is supported by users like you. No advertisements. No trackers. No kidding.


• Be yourself – You can use your existing phone number and address book to securely communicate with your friends.


• Speak up – Whether they live across town or across the ocean, Link’s enhanced audio and video quality will make your friends and family feel closer.


• Whisper in the shadows – Switch to the dark theme if you refuse to see the light.


• Picture this – Use the built-in image editing features to sketch, crop, and flip your outgoing photos. There’s even a text tool so that you can add more words to the 1,000 that your picture is already worth.

apps.title: JusTalk Kids - Safe Messenger
apps.description:
JusTalk Kids is a kid-friendly voice and video calling and instant messaging app designed to keep children safely connected with family, friends, and classmates. All communications are end-to-end encrypted to ensure privacy and protection from strangers or inappropriate content.

Beyond chat and calls, JusTalk Kids offers fun, creative tools like educational videos, a doodle board, and a text editor to encourage imagination and learning — all in a safe digital space.

Key Features
• Parent-Approved Friend Management
Children can only add friends with parental approval. Parents receive instant notifications for all friend requests and can easily approve or reject them — ensuring kids only connect with trusted contacts.

• Safe Voice & Video Calling
JusTalk Kids supports high-quality 1-on-1 and group voice/video calls with features like call recording, real-time doodling, and interactive games — making conversations fun and meaningful, even at a distance.

• Walkie Talkie (Push-to-Talk)
Send quick voice messages instantly by pressing and holding — no call needed. A fun, hands-free way for kids to stay in touch with friends and family.

• Smart Content Monitoring
Sensitive images or videos are automatically flagged and blocked. Parents are notified and can review the content to decide what’s appropriate, helping children safely navigate online communication.

• JusTalk Parent Account
Manage your child’s app remotely: approve friends, monitor activity, and customize settings — all from your own JusTalk app.

• Creative Messaging & Sharing
Kids can send text, photos, voice messages, GIFs, drawings, stickers, and more. They can also share life moments by posting creations like art, stories, and music — all within a safe, closed environment.

• Educational Content on Kidstube
Explore a growing library of kid-friendly videos including science experiments, crafts, and learning activities — curated to spark curiosity in a safe, ad-free space.

• Full Privacy & Data Protection
Every message and call is encrypted. JusTalk Kids never shares your child’s personal data and gives parents full control over app access and content exposure.

apps.title: xPal Ultra Secure Messenger
apps.description:
xPal gives you the freedom to speak without fear, connect without compromise, and erase your past without a trace. No phone number. No SIM. No email. Just encrypted, anonymous messaging—backed by military-grade security.

Create your private xID—a unique 9-digit global passport for messaging, calling, and file sharing across borders, without exposing your identity. No country codes. No personal information. No one tracking you.

True Privacy. Total Control.

• No phone number, email, or personal info required
• Unlimited encrypted texts and audio calls for free
• 30 minutes of secure video calling every day free
• Global reach—message any xID, anywhere in the world, no country or area code.

Your xID = Your Digital Armor

With xPal, you don’t have a profile. You have an xID—anonymous, secure, and untraceable. Communicate freely across borders without ever giving up your name, location, or identity.

Erase Your Past. Take Back Control.

• Terminate™ – Wipe out entire conversations from both sides—even months later
• Flicker™ Mode – Disappearing messages that vanish after being seen
• Total Wipeout™ – Enter your PIN in reverse to instantly delete everything from all devices
• Remote Wipeout – Lost your phone? Wipe your xPal data from a new one
• Decoy PIN – Enter a fake PIN to open a fake account under pressure

Clean Media. No Metadata.

• Photo & Video Distiller™ – Automatically removes all metadata before sending
• Encrypted Vault (Xave) Compatible– Securely store images, videos, and documents privately with seamless integration with Xave Secure Vault App. 
• Self-Destruct – Auto-delete all xPal data if you don’t access the app within your chosen timeframe

Zero Tracking. Zero Storage. Zero Leaks.

• We never collect your name, number, contacts, or location
• We don’t access or back up your encrypted messages
• Messages are deleted from our servers once delivered—or expire if undelivered

Fast Setup. Fully Anonymous.

• No SIM. No phone number. No email. No personal information required
• Choose a screen name, set your PIN, and get your xID in seconds
• Invite friends and family to create their own xIDs and start encrypted chats and calls instantly

Independently Audited & Certified

xPal Encrypted Messenger has been rigorously tested and certified by DEKRA, a global cybersecurity leader. Our MASA certification ensures you’re protected by the highest mobile 
security standards.

Our Mission

We exist to protect free speech, safeguard your privacy, and give you back the power to control your communication. No profiles. No surveillance. No compromises.

xPal Encrypted Messenger
Speak freely. Stay Anonymous.

Terms of use: https://xpal.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://xpal.com/privacy-policy

raw_data.releaseNotes:

•Hide Name in Notifications: Extra privacy—hide your name from message notifications.
•Last Seen & Typing Status: Decide who can see your last seen and when you're typing.
•Improved Call Performance: Better voice quality and reliability, even on weak signals.
•Bug Fixes: We've squashed bugs to improve performance and stability.

apps.title: Moe: Recover Deleted Messages
apps.description:
Backup and recover your deleted messages with Moe. You can open your saved messages in the application.

Highlights:

-Retrieves and recovers backed up messages.

-With the fast messaging feature, just write your message and number.

-Provides a second messaging opportunity

-Secure and never stores data!

Premium Subscriptions:

• The subscribed user has unlimited access to Moe services.
• User can subscribe to a one-week ($4.99) auto-renewing subscription
• Non-subscribed users can benefit from these services with a limited daily quota.
• Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account upon confirmation of purchase.
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period and the renewal cost will be determined.
• Subscriptions can be managed by the user and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will, where applicable, be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

We would love to receive all your feedback to improve our app.

Terms of Use: https://potoxapp.com/pages/potoxapp/terms

Privacy Policy: https://potoxapp.com/pages/potoxapp/privacy

Support: https://potoxapp.com/pages/support

apps.title: Letstalk IM
apps.description:
Letstalk provides free, no advertisement communication services with multiple encryptions  for individuals or businesses around the world. Others cannot get your profile, messages, or calls under multiple security encryptions. Letstalk supports cross-device, multi-account management, and the variety of chat settings.

• Send a post about your life:  Share files or latest news to your friends or family in the chatroom.

• No more losing important messages: Save the message to the Safe Box and set a password for the security.

• Account management: Log in to all your accounts on the same device and switch at any time.

• Let messages disappear automatically: Send the ""Burn after read"" message or set the message preserve time, deleting the message when expired.

• Send the greetings or remind someone on time: Preset the text and sending time, the message will be sent automatically when expires.

• Want to express your feeling: Send a sticker or adjust the display size of text, make your messages vividly.

Want to know more about Letstalk?
• Letstalk: https://www.letstalk.net/
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LetstalkIM/
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/letstalk.im/

apps.title: IM+ Instant Messenger
apps.description:
IM+ is an all-in-one app for messaging and social networking.

IM+ unites all your favorite social channels in one app. Chat on Telegram and Messenger while checking your Twitter feeds and Reddit. And if you have to manage multiple Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook accounts, no problem! IM+ supports multiple accounts per service in a simple interface. IM+ will save you a lot of time and space on your iPhone and iPad.

List of supported services: ChatGPT, Twitter, Telegram, Facebook, Messenger, WhatsApp (iPad), Instagram, TikTok, Skype, Gmail, Slack, Reddit, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Tinder, Outlook, and more to come!
- Multiple accounts per service
- No unwanted ads
- TikTok added
- WhatsApp supported on iPad
- ChatGPT support

Subscription pricing and terms:

* IM+ offers auto-renewing monthly and yearly subscription options. The yearly plan is $19.99 and the monthly plan is $2.99. 
* Payment will be charged to your App Store Account at confirmation of purchase
* Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
* Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period
* Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after purchase
* Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription.
Read more about our terms and conditions here:
* Terms of service: https://www.shape.ag/en/terms/
* Privacy policy: https://www.shape.ag/en/privacy/

Please follow @implus on Twitter and like fb.com/plusim to get the latest updates from your IM+ team!

apps.title: Burner: Second Phone Number
apps.description:
Burner is the only app that provides you with total control over your communications and boundaries by providing multiple phone numbers with settings for life, play, and more. 

HOW BURNER WORKS
Sign up for Burner and select an area code to create your private number
Enjoy sending and receiving unlimited SMS messages and calls (all you need is a Wi-Fi connection or mobile data)
Burn your number whenever you want and get a new anonymous line

UNLIMITED CALLING & TEXTING
Get started instantly (like, literally, right now…) with a second phone line for calling and texting.
Send unlimited SMS and make as many calls as you need with no restrictions.

KEEP YOUR NUMBER SAFE
Create multiple phone numbers to share with different people or situations—we don’t care what you use the numbers for, we just care that your personal number stays private.
Burn or swap numbers whenever you want to cut off unwanted contact or safeguard your identity.

ORGANIZE YOUR SOCIAL CIRCLES
Use separate numbers for dating, family, or hobbies—no more mixing messages.
Customize each number with unique labels or settings to keep everything organized.
Stay on top of conversations with a simple, clutter-free interface. Ahhhhhh, bliss.

PROTECT YOUR PRIVACY
Communicate without exposing your personal phone number in online marketplaces, ads, or social media. That’s sooooo early 2000s.
Disguise your identity effortlessly with disposable numbers for one-time use cases (or longer-term situations!).

SPAM BLOCKING & MUTING
Block unwanted callers and stop spam texts in their tracks with robust filtering options.
Mute notifications from specific numbers or contacts when you need peace and quiet.

SET BOUNDARIES WITH DO NOT DISTURB
Schedule quiet hours with customizable do-not-disturb settings tailored to your routine. A paid personal assistant could never.
Control who can reach you and when, ensuring personal time remains actually uninterrupted.

ATTAIN INBOX BLISS
Color-code your numbers or inbox to easily separate, social, and personal messages.
Combine intuitive tools like quick filters and search to find messages seamlessly.

NEW PREMIUM FEATURES (Requires Premium Subscription)
*VPN* – Our brand new feature! Because nobody needs to know what you’re browsing on your phone
Audio Messaging – Get personal and versatile with voice messages
Video Messaging – Share short, secure video messages on the go
AI Voicemail (powered by Phone.ai)  – Smart voicemail technology
Reverse Number Lookup – Verify (annoying) unknown numbers

BEST IN CLASS
We’re not here to brag (okay, maybe a little), but we’ve been featured as a TIME Magazine Top 50 App and we’ve appeared in The New York Times, WIRED, TechCrunch, Engadget, and more.

Why do they all love us so much? Download the app to see for yourself, but we’ve been recognized for excellence and innovation (and the fact that we offer real numbers, not those fake ones).

Burner is the most reliable and fully featured virtual phone number app available, boasting premium calling & texting features. Life is complicated enough. Your phone doesn’t have to be.

PLANS & PRICING
Burner is free to download and try with a 3-day free trial. Additional features are available through our subscription plans.

Monthly Subscription: $9.99/month
Annual Subscription: $4.99/month (billed annually at $59.99/year)
Premium Subscription: $89.99/year

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS
Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user by going to Account Settings after purchase.

THE FINE PRINT
Privacy Policy: burnerapp.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: burnerapp.com/terms-of-service

Important: Calls use cell phone minutes. Trial includes limited free usage. Check pricing details before purchasing. Not compatible with SMS shortcode services or 911 emergency services. Available in the US and Canada only. Not available in Puerto Rico.

apps.title: NetSfere Secure Messaging
apps.description:
NetSfere provides enterprises with a private, highly secure, reliable, centrally managed and controlled, cloud-based mobile messaging service backed by 2,000 years of combined messaging experience delivering trillions of messages globally.

A mobile first and enterprise first messaging app, NetSfere offers a robust set of features that improve productivity and help enterprises comply with regulatory standards. Key Benefits include:

Security:

A 256-bit industry leading security algorithm that supports device-to-device encryption.

Control:

A centralized administrative portal that controls end-user policies and privileges as mandated by the enterprise.

Compliance:

Administrative, physical, and technical safeguards to comply with regulatory requirements like GDPR, HIPAA, Sarbanes-Oxley, Dodd-Frank, FINRA and others.

Collaboration:

HD audio and video calling, screen sharing, emergency and broadcast communication channels within the enterprise and secure messaging capability across the entire ecosystem of outside vendors, partners and clients.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
NetSfere introduces the industry’s first Quantum-Proof Secure Communication Platform powered by ML-KEM 1024 quantum-safe encryption, setting a new standard in secure messaging. As quantum computing threats become a reality, NetSfere ensures your data remains protected today and in the future.

Now unleash the power of the new Net-C AI Chatbot that gives instant access to your enterprise’s knowledge base - policies, procedures, and more of your choosing accessible through a secure and familiar messaging experience. It’s a game-changer for productivity, user experience, and operational speed.

apps.title: WDM: Message without saving
apps.description:
Tired of saving contacts just to send one message?
WDM lets you chat instantly without cluttering your address book.
Just paste the number, select the country, and tap Start Chat.

WDM is a simple, privacy-friendly utility that lets you instantly start a chat with any number—without needing to save it to your contacts.

Just copy a phone number, open WDM, and the app will detect and paste it for you. You can also use the built-in dial pad to enter a number manually or scan numbers and QR codes directly.

WDM also remembers your recent activity, making it easy to reconnect with previously contacted numbers.

Key Features:
- Start a conversation with any number instantly—no need to save contacts
- Smart number detection from clipboard, camera, and photos
- Built-in dialer optimized for iOS users
- History of recent messages for quick access
- Clean, ad-free experience

WDM is designed to make quick messaging effortless, whether for business or personal use.

Download WDM now and simplify how you stay in touch.

Privacy Policy: https://beetahub.com/wdm/privacy-policy.html
Terms of Use: https://beetahub.com/wdm/terms-and-conditions.html

Tired of saving contacts just to send one message?
WDM lets you chat instantly without cluttering your address book.
Just paste the number, select the country, and tap Start Chat.

WDM is a simple, privacy-friendly utility that lets you instantly start a chat with any number—without needing to save it to your contacts.

Just copy a phone number, open WDM, and the app will detect and paste it for you. You can also use the built-in dial pad to enter a number manually or scan numbers and QR codes directly.

WDM also remembers your recent activity, making it easy to reconnect with previously contacted numbers.

Key Features:
- Start a conversation with any number instantly—no need to save contacts
- Smart number detection from clipboard, camera, and photos
- Built-in dialer optimized for iOS users
- History of recent messages for quick access
- Clean, ad-free experience

WDM is designed to make quick messaging effortless, whether for business or personal use.

Download WDM now and simplify how you stay in touch.

Privacy Policy: https://beetahub.com/wdm/privacy-policy.html
Terms of Use: https://beetahub.com/wdm/terms-and-conditions.html

apps.title: MultiChat Business Messenger
apps.description:
MultiChat Business Messenger : Your Smarter Messaging Companion

MultiChat Messenger is designed for people who need more control over their messaging life. Whether you’re managing personal and work conversations or just prefer using your tablet or Vision Pro, MultiChat brings together the messaging platforms you already use — like Whatsapp Web and Telegram Web — into one seamless experience.

Say goodbye to switching tabs, logging in and out, or juggling between apps. With MultiChat, your messages stay organized, accessible, and secure — across all your devices.

Key Features

Unified Messaging Hub
Access multiple services like Whatsapp Web and Telegram Web in one app. No need to open separate apps or browsers, MultiChat gives you a central place to view and manage all your conversations.

Multi-Account Support
Easily handle more than one account for services like Whatsapp Web, perfect for separating work and personal messaging.

Smart AI Replies
Let AI help you respond faster. MultiChat includes intelligent suggestions that adapt to your tone and context, helping you stay efficient without losing the human touch.

Custom Message Templates
Save and reuse your most common replies or instructions. Ideal for small business owners, customer support, or anyone who communicates often.

Message Reminders
Set gentle reminders for messages you need to follow up on. Never forget to reply to something important again.

Multi-Device Flexibility
Use MultiChat across tablets, smartphones, smartwatches, and even Vision Pro — stay connected no matter what device you’re using.

Privacy First
Keep your conversations private. MultiChat offers local encryption and password protection so your messages stay secure and accessible only to you.

Personalization Options
Choose custom fonts and enable dark mode to make your messaging space feel more personal and comfortable.


What Our Users Say
	•	“MultiChat helps me stay on top of all my messages without the chaos.” – Sara L
	•	“Using both my Whatsapp Web accounts in one place is a huge win.” – John H
	•	“The reminder and AI features are surprisingly helpful.” – Elon T


Why Choose MultiChat
MultiChat Messenger is a productivity focused tool designed to enhance how you message across platforms. Whether you’re replying to customers, managing friends and family chats, or organizing your daily conversations, MultiChat provides the clarity, speed, and control.

apps.title: Threema. The Secure Messenger
apps.description:
Threema is the world’s best-selling secure messenger and keeps your data out of the hands of hackers, corporations, and governments. The service can be used completely anonymously. Threema is open source and offers every feature one would expect from a state-of-the-art instant messenger. The app also allows to make end-to-end encrypted voice, video and group calls. Using the desktop app and the web client, you can also use Threema from your desktop.

PRIVACY AND ANONYMITY
Threema is designed from the ground up to generate as little data on servers as possible. Group memberships and contact lists are managed on your device only, and never stored on our servers. Messages are immediately deleted after they have been delivered. Local files are stored encrypted on your mobile phone or tablet. All this effectively prevents the collection and misuse of your personal information, including metadata. Threema is fully compliant with the European privacy legislation (GDPR).

ROCK-SOLID ENCRYPTION
Threema end-to-end encrypts all your communication, including messages, voice and video calls, group chats, files, and even status messages. Only the intended recipient, and nobody else, can read your messages. Threema uses the trusted open source NaCl cryptography library for encryption. The encryption keys are generated and safely stored on the users’ devices to prevent backdoor access or copies.

COMPREHENSIVE FEATURES 
Threema is not only an encrypted and private messenger but also versatile and feature-rich.

• Write text and send voice messages
• Edit and delete sent messages on the recipient’s end
• Make voice, video and group calls
• Share videos, pictures and locations
• Send any type of file (PDF, animated GIF, MP3, DOC, ZIP, etc.)
• Use the desktop app or the web client to chat from your computer
• Create groups
• Conduct polls
• Choose between a dark and a light theme
• React to messages with emojis
• Verify the identity of a contact by scanning their personal QR code
• Use Threema as anonymous instant messaging tool
• Synchronize your contacts (optional)

SERVERS IN SWITZERLAND
All our servers are located in Switzerland, and we develop our software in-house.

FULL ANONYMITY
Each Threema user receives a random Threema ID for identification. A phone number or email address is not required to use Threema. This unique feature allows you to use Threema completely anonymously – no need to give up private information or to open an account. 

OPEN SOURCE AND AUDITS
The source code of the Threema app is open for everyone to review. On top of that, renowned experts are regularly commissioned to conduct systematic security audits of Threema’s code.

NO ADS, NO TRACKERS
Threema is not financed by advertising and does not collect user data.

SUPPORT / CONTACT
For questions or problems please consult our FAQs: https://threema.ch/en/faq

apps.title: ChatSecure Messenger
apps.description:
ChatSecure is a free and open source messaging app that features OTR and OMEMO encryption over XMPP. You can create new accounts on public XMPP servers, or even connect to your own server for extra security.

Unlike other apps that keep you stuck in their walled garden, ChatSecure is fully interoperable with other clients that support OTR, OMEMO and XMPP.

ChatSecure only uses well-known open source cryptographic libraries to keep your conversations private. Other apps may make claims about 'military grade' security but, without publicly auditable source code and verifiable end-to-end encryption, you cannot be truly safe.

* XMPP with TLS certificate pinning.
* OTR for verifiable end-to-end encryption and forward secrecy.
* OMEMO for a mobile-friendly alternative to OTR.
* SQLCipher to locally encrypt conversation logs.
* Free and Open Source: https://github.com/chatsecure/chatsecure-ios

Follow @ChatSecure on Twitter: https://twitter.com/chatsecure

►► ChatSecure Donations
Subscribe to ChatSecure to help make developing free and open source privacy tools sustainable. We welcome any contribution to support ongoing development. The donation levels are currently $2.99/month, $5.99/month or $19.99/month. Here's what you get:

• Feel good supporting indie software
• Continued development and updates
• Help keep the app free for everyone

To manage your subscription:
• You can turn off auto-renewal via the main Settings app: http://support.apple.com/kb/ht4098
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your iTunes account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
• Visit the following URL to view our Privacy Policy: https://chatsecure.org/privacy/
• Visit the following URL for full terms of use: https://chatsecure.org/terms/

raw_data.releaseNotes:

* Fix media SQLCipher WAL size
* Minor onboarding changes

apps.title: KakaoTalk : Messenger
apps.description:
■ KakaoTalk – Korea’s no. 1 messenger
KakaoTalk is more than just a free messenger. It brings you instant connection, fun short-form content, and smart AI features—anytime, anywhere. Enjoy meaningful one-on-one and group conversations with friends, family, and colleagues, and discover new communities you're interested in via Open Chat. You can also share photos, videos, and files in just a tap!
 
■ Chat made easier, experience made better
Keep your chats organized with folders, and easily edit or delete messages you’ve sent. Keep discussions on track with the new Threads feature, so every topic stays clear and easy to follow.
  
■ Voice Talk & Face Talk with screen sharing
Hop on a group Voice Talk or Face Talk with up to 10 people. During a call, you can switch to Face Talk or share your screen. Make your Face Talk more fun with various screen effects.
 
■ See trends at a glance in Open Chat communities
Discover real-time trends in Open Chat communities without entering a chat room. Choose a topic of interest and dive straight into the conversation.
 
■ Your profile with extra dimensionality
Your profile is your own space to showcase your interests and tastes. Feel free to set your profile visibility by chat room.
 
KakaoTalk may request access permissions to deliver its full range of features. You can still use the app without granting optional permissions, though some functions may be limited. 
 
[Optional permissions]
 - Location Services: For searching and sharing location information
 - Contacts: For adding friends, and sending contacts and profiles
 - Photos: For sending and saving photos, videos, and files
 - Bluetooth: For connecting to wireless audio devices
 - Microphone: For Voice Talk, Face Talk, voice messages, and recording
 - Speech Recognition: For speech-to-text transcriptions
 - Camera: For Face Talk, capturing photos/videos, and scanning QR codes and card numbers
 - Notifications: For receiving various alerts and message notifications
 
* “KakaoTalk,” “Info Talk,” “Open Chat,” “Face Talk,” etc., are registered trademarks (®) and trademarks (™) of Kakao Corp. ® and ™ symbols are omitted in the app.
 
[KakaoTalk on social]
 - Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kakao.today 
 - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@Kakaobrandmedia
 
[Kakao Customer Service] 
https://cs.kakao.com/helps?service=8

raw_data.releaseNotes:

 : The redesigned emoticon keyboard now features search, emoticon, mini emoticon tabs.
 : Check out new default emoticons in the mini emoticons tab!
 
KakaoTalk is working hard to improve user experience and security. Update to the latest version to enjoy chatting with your friends using new features.

apps.title: ChatDip Messenger
apps.description:
ChatDip Messenger – A Unique & Free Messaging App!
Stay connected with friends and family effortlessly using ChatDip Messenger. With no ads or subscription fees, it’s designed to offer a seamless and private messaging experience.
Experience Secure, Ad-Free Messaging.

Private Messages
Share text, photos, videos, and voice messages privately. Messages remain hidden until tapped, triggering a timer for automatic deletion. Your secrets stay safe!
 
End-to-End Encryption
Your chats are fully secured with end-to-end encryption. Only you and your contacts can read or hear your conversations—not even ChatDip.
 
Innovative Camera
Capture moments with ease using our unique camera. Swipe up or down for smooth zoom in/out functionality.
 
Availability Modes
Switch between three availability modes:
Online: Available to all contacts (Green).
Away: Appear away, even when using the app, for 8, 24, or 48 hours (Orange).
Do Not Disturb: Stay undisturbed while focusing on other things (Red).
 
Group Chats
Connect with family and friends through group chats. Share messages, photos, audio, and videos effortlessly.
 
Stories
Celebrate your moments by sharing text, photos, and videos as Stories. Stories disappear after 24 hours, and you control who can view them.
 
Please visit us at
For more information: https://chatdip.com/contact-us/
For Terms & Privacy:  https://chatdip.com/privacy-policy/

Ultra secure instant messaging, voice (on/off net) video calls, secure conference calling, email and more.

There’s private, and then there’s Pryvate. 

Pryvate Messenger is the new standard for secure messaging and communication.

Unrivalled Security:
Pryvate uses ultra secure encryption without dropping data packets.

OS-proof privacy - your phone’s operating system cannot access your in-app data.

Instant Messaging and Communication:
Messaging.
Crystal clear on-net/off-net voice calls.
Low data use with nomadic calls.
Video calls.
Sharing voice notes, pictures, video, documents and more.
Conference calls.

Pryvate’s superpower is its direct communication and data exchange between users' devices without relying on a central server.

Low-Cost International  and Off Net calling option:

Pryvate works anywhere in the world - even where you’d least expect.

Burner Phone Capabilities:
